title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I agree with the idea that young people do not support their local community nowadays. There are two reasons why young people do so. First of all, the mobility of young people is supported by the economic power of their family. Long ago, typical Japanese life depended on their local community. Under these circumstances, young people can easily help their local community because they are familiar with that region and have many friends and neighbors.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Young people enjoy life more than older people do? To answer this question is important to take two points of view, the first one is to answer why young people enjoy life, and then answer why old people enjoy life, and finally i will see who enjoy life more, young people or older people. I think that younger people enjoy life, because they are in an age where everything is known, they are exploring the world, they are dreaming, they are building their goal, which is a wonderful moment in life. It is when people start to grow up , and during this process they understand and respond to many questions that only living can answer, It is a stage when you can make a mistake, and it is ok because you are learning, no one is going to judge you, It is part of learning. I think that i am in a great moment of my life, I feel and I am young, and if i take my own experience i can say that i really enjoy my life, i had difficulties in my life but they were just part of it, sometimes you need to feel and then stand up and go on, thats life. By the other hand, i think that older people also enjoy life, because no matter the age that you have you will always learn , and at this point in your life you have more experience, so you dont have to worry about if you are going to make a mistake, because you know that if you make it everything will be ok. For example my grand ma was an old lady, but she was a kid, she never felt old, she always learning , and at this point in her life she had more experience ,t do when se was a child so she didn't have to worry about it. Know she is death, but she teaches that life is only one and you have to enjoy it, no matter your age.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I fully agree with the claim that it is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts. This method of teaching has been widely known and is used by students all over the world. And I agree with this method because I believe students require full understanding of concepts therefore they could have longer knowledge, and create their own thoughts through understanding the concepts. First of all, the most effective way to learn things would be understanding concepts and ideas. Since students get to understand its concepts or the ideas, it makes them fully understand it and also, it remains in students' minds and it becomes part of their knowledge for longer than when they learn its facts. For instance, from my personal experience, I only remember a few mathematical formulas or the scientific terms that I memorised when I was in middle school. Moreover, I could only memorise a few things even from last year which facts I have learned. On the other hand, I can crystalize things that I have experienced. For instance, I have clear memories that I have learned from experiments in biology class which I experienced in my younger age. In fact, understanding ideas and concepts is very important for students and is a more effective way to learn than it is for them to learn facts. Secondly, Understanding the concepts makes students able to think further. Interestingly, most of the great inventions such as the phone and computers came from basic understanding of the concepts. Thus, sometimes facts work well for students to learn complex things.

Moreover, I could only memorise a few things even from last year which facts I have learned. On the other hand, I can crystalize things that I have experienced. For instance, I have clear memories that I have learned from experiments in biology class which I experienced in my younger age. In fact, understanding ideas and concepts is very important for students and is a more effective way to learn than it is for them to learn facts. Secondly, Understanding the concepts makes students able to think further. Interestingly, most of the great inventions such as the phone and computers came from basic understanding of the concepts.", 'Thus, sometimes facts work well for students to learn complex things.']

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: People often discuss whether successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well. I strongly believe that successful people tend to face and challenge new things and tasks rather than doing one thing they can do well. First of all, those who are changing constantly can succeed now. Some people think that doing one thing continuously is more efficient than doing many things. However, It is now not available. Nowadays, everything is so fast and complex. So people can easily feel bored at the same thing. For example, as many people know, the rock group 'Radiohead' is still popular. They have been singing for more than ten years. there were many popular rock groups at that time. Radiohead changed their music style and challenged new things that people had never heard. If they had had stock in their one style of music, they could not have continued their popularization. Furthermore, challenging new things and facing new tasks are more exciting and refreshing. Only doing onething makes people feel bored and lazy. people who are lazy can not be better than those who are excited about doing something. suppose you have to eat hamburger everyday. Even if the hamburgers are delicious, you would be sick of having the same food. Moreover, While people challenge new things people can learn new skills. we do not need to try something which we already know how to do well.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: It is debatable whether young people do not give enough time to helping their communities or not. some people say that they can not find the reason why they have to care about their communities. However, I firmly believe that helping their communities is quite an important thing in their life. First of all, We can not live by ourselves. we have to help each other. of course that is an option and we can choose whatever we want, but nowadays, It would be harder and harder if people tried to live bythemselves. If we try to spend our time in communities, It can be a good way to get to know many people who can help us when we get into a hard time. For example, I was trying to have my own piano recitle in my communites. and I heard that is not so easy. but fortunately I was a volunteer in my community last summer and through that experience, I had a chance to get to know lots of people who could help me. so I could have a report very easily because of their recommendations. Secondly, we can improve our social skills. nowadays, people tend to be isolated. but I dont think that is the best way to live. For example, I have a friend and she always tries to be alone in her room. I thought she enjoyed her time by herself but one day, she got a disease and It was depression. If she tried to live out of her room, she would get sick.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.

Young people can go travelling any where in any condition or do all kinds of sports even if they are not good at them, But older people because of some kind of sickness. they could not take some traffic like the ship. There are also some sports because of the age problem, they could not enjoy them. and we often see some instruction in the playground. some really good games are age restricted. Second, young people's minds are older than the old ones.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: It is debatable what is the better choice between having broad knowledge of many academic subjects and specializing in one specific subject. Some people say learning about many academic subjects is more useful for their life because the more we learn, the more we can use it during our lives. However, I disagree with that opinion because there is not enough time to study a specific subject perfectly and studying many things has no use in society.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: No one wants to be poor; everyone wants to improve their own status, or quality of life. That's why people try to work hard on studying or exploring. Then successful people tend to try new thing s and take risks because of three befits; new opportunities , high outcomes, and freeness. First of all, trying new things has new opportunities. Because no one has done it before, if people pursue new things, they can be the first people in a particular field. I-pod examinations this outcome. Because the creator of the I-pod made the first creative MP3, the I-pod became the symbol of MP3, making many profits. There are so many MP3 in the music world, but the I-pod is the first, making a strong impression onfolks. Secondly, successful people tend to take risks and get the possibility of a high outcome. If people avoid taking risks and bet just a small amount of money. they are never going to be the same status throughout their lives. Successful people, for example, spend a large amount of money to build a new office instead of limiting risks, they created a great office, making employees comfortable and willing to do their tasks. Finally, trying and taking risks have freedom leading to success. As I said, no one has done it before, people exploring new things do not have to follow existing rules or retrospects. Sometimes, bad habits kill new imaginative ideas. In order to succeed, creative thinking is crucial to making profits. All in all, successful people are more likely to start new things and take risks for new opportunities, huge benefits, and freedom. People tend to be afraid to try new things and take risks and avoid these things.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Some people agree that young people enjoy life more than older people do. However, others disagree. In my opinion, I think the former statement is true. This is because young people are energetic, brave, and courageous. Young people always have energy to do many things. For example, they will use their free time to hang out with their friends. They will go to some places to enjoy themselves as clubs, bars, and movie centers. Furthermore, young people are more attracted by the colourful world rather than staying at home. They are afraid of grounding because it is indispensable for them to have fun. In addition to being energetic, people who are young have the bold to enjoy their life. For instance, they try to do things which older people are afraid to do. Like ferry wheels. One can conceive a 80-year-old man sitting on the ferry wheels will almost kill him, but not a young person. They are always curious about new things. Moreover, they will not bother how much money they have left. Instead, they will have a great time spending the money to find their dream beautiful life. Finally, young people can endure the challenges. An example is, they will challenge new stuff to know the right way to enjoy life even including doing drugs.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: I do believe that it is not about agreeing or disagreeing. I do believe that it depends on the people themselves. There are two kinds of people and let us listen to their opinions. The first group say that it is a good idea to be led by a tour guide. They say that the guide knows better than us and he is capable of answering all kinds of questions that we have; therefore, we will be able to know everything about the thing that we are visiting. The second group say that it is a bad idea because we have to consider the time factor. For example, if we liked something and we wanted to spend more time on it we wouldn't be able to do it because we are not alone. Being without a guide will give us the opportunity and the freedom to do what we want whenever we want. Both of the groups agreed that being with a tour guide would give them more information about the things that they were visiting.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I disagree with the statement that ideas and concepts are more important than facts for students. Actually from my point of view, facts are the same important just as ideas and concepts. First, without facts, how come the ideas and concepts? Ideas and concepts can not be separated from facts. For example, when we learn the concept of force in physics, students need to do experiments to be aware of the fact that there are different kinds of force everywhere in the world. The teacher will confuse the students if he or she just draws a symbol and points it at them, then says " Look, it is what we call force". By doing this, the teacher is at the rick of being fired.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: Although many people think that there is nothing to worry about while there is a guide. He would be responsible for all the needs they want. I personally disagree with the assertion that going with a tour guide is the best way to travel. First of all, traveling with a group could waste a lot of time waiting for another person. And it is very inconvenient to go travelling with a lot of people, especially as they are all strangers to me. There will be several rules that you should follow. It is not romance and happy at all. Second, the tour guide often wants to have an abundant impression of all the people in the group. The places are arranged too much; in the end, there is always not enough time to spend in each place the group has been to. I could not remember or experience the environments where I only spent five minutes staying with them. I need more time and enjoy the difference between where I live and where I used to live. Last but not least, I have heard more than one time that people have the same impression of the same country they have been to. It is because the guide always takes people to the same place. For example, It is the same as the pictures of my friends and my parents which they took in France, only the faces are different. However, I want something more than all the people's experiences. To see the real things happening in foreign countries is more interesting than the photos on the post cards. In conclusion, it is not interesting at all if I can not decide where I want to go. The most interesting part of traveling is to study the country and decide where to go, and it would be better if there are some things unexpected happened. Going with a group is definitely one of my choices.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: There have been a lot of events from the past in Korea : the Korean war, the invasion from Japan, many political incidents, and so on. That's why the older generation has gone through roughly in Korea. However, the young generation has no problem living within our country these days without thinking of many problems the older generation has had. There are some evidences that show why I think young people enjoy life more than older people do. On a trip field, it is kind of boom for many young people in Korea to go to Europe for their travel recently. Not only Europe, but also many countries, such as the States, the U. K. , southern Asia, Latin America. The most important thing is that they go travelling with their money which is from their part-time job or their work. Whereas, there is no doubt that older people didn't usually go travelling abroad when they were younger. It's because they couldn't afford travelling abroad at that time, which doesn't mean that they didn't want to. Besides, development for flying abroad was not enough for them at that time. In other words, there were a few barriers for older people to travel abroad. As to the work as it concerned, while older people had to work 6 days a week from 9 a. m. to 8 p. m. , even more, the younger generation has "working for 5 days a week from 9 to 5" these days. They can even take a rest on Friday for some jobs. That's the reason why they can enjoy life on the weekends. They go shopping, go to a concert, go to a theatre, and go on a holiday. As well as there are lots of entertainments that they can enjoy. I would believe that many older people enjoy life more than they used to these days.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: Learning is an important and difficult issue for students. First They have to understand what they should learn. Some people claim that learning ideas and concepts is very important and some other people agree that learning facts is exactly much more essential. I agree that learning ideas and concepts is much more important than learning facts in terms of forming more creative and responsive individuals. As I mentioned above learning ideas and concepts should become prior for students because the major aim of the learning is educating himself and increasing the information to make some sort of comparisons or to come up with results or new ideas. Therefore, learning facts is impossible for students and anyone, they have to create and form their own facts by combining the ideas and concepts that they learn.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: We only live once, and for quite a short period of time. It is possible to divide life into two halves. The first half is from the birth to the age of forty, and I am sure you will guess the second one. The descending time follows the ascending time. But is reality so binary ? A proof that young people enjoy life more than older people is that children always laugh. But why are they so happy ? Certainly because everything is still possible for them. They are able to run and play football while elderly people sit in their wheel chairs. They learn and improve their skills every single day while it is exactly the opposite for older people. Young people are able to love and not feel concerned by the problems the world faces : they do not even know what tomorrow will be made of ! Hopefully, older people have other sources of pleasure. Above all they have a lot of free time which they can use to do everything they want. They have no reason to doubt about their future, because it is behind them.

A proof that young people enjoy life more than older people is that children always laugh. But why are they so happy ? Certainly because everything is still possible for them. They are able to run and play football while elderly people sit in their wheel chairs. They learn and improve their skills every single day while it is exactly the opposite for older people. Young people are able to love and not feel concerned by the problems the world faces : they do not even know what tomorrow will be made of ! Hopefully, older people have other sources of pleasure. Above all they have a lot of free time which they can use to do everything they want.', 'They have no reason to doubt about their future, because it is behind them.']

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I am inclined to agree with the statement that people who take risks and try something new rather then doing what they know make them successful. I have certain reasons to agress with this statement which I will discuss later in my essays. I would also like to highlight the fact that taking such risks might not get the success in the 1st attempt, sometimes people need to attempt multiple times. The main reason for this my view is that I believe in the "More risk, More gain" philosophy. If I decide to get into some new business/idea, which nobody has tried, I need comparatively more resources in terms of money, time and effort to pursue this new venture. There is a chance that this new venture could fail, but on the positive note if that business/idea succeeds , I would have a tremendous potential to make money in this new business as I will not have much competition. I will give an example of John Chambers, CEO of a networking company. This company was traditionally in the business of selling networking devices. As its business became more mature and competition increased , John decided to take some risks and expanded into the telephony business and became successful in this new business. This company ranks as number one in telephone business. The 2nd reason for my view is that unless I venture into unknown territories I will not know what lies there. As a human, we always have this comfort zone which we do not want to leave but there is no guarantee that there is no risk in what we are doing today. My brother has a gift business and he was very comfortable in that business. I insisted him to try exporting business, though he was initially reluctant but he tried and became successful. In conclusion, I believe that risk taking is a shirt cut to success which we should try.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I strongly agree with the opinion that young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities. Some people say this society has lots of young people who help our communities and show some examples of articles in newspapers written about young people who help the community, but I think they are particular young people. Most young people do not spend their time helping their communities. It is real nowadays. Lots of young people are personalized people nowadays. They do not think about others' situations. The only thing they focused on was their own problem. Moreover, young people nowadays do not like activity or performance, rather like staying at home. At home, they play computer games or video games. They even communicate with their friends on line and not off-line. For example, they chat and do group homework via a messenger program on a computer. It is natural that these two boys do not like helping their communities. Helping communities needs lots of activity. Studying harder than in the past is one reason, too. Young people in the past were not depressed by studying.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I personally agree with the statement that it is very important for students to understand ideas and concepts rather than just learning the facts because for a student getting to understand many facts is very important before applying them. For example, let us take a student who on the school stage appears for an exam. If he prepares a particular lesson in the syllabus by mere mugging or learning the facts in the textbook without getting to understand the concept and the idea of what the lesson expresses ,it would be very difficult for him to pen down on his examination because one can basically only rely on memory. What if the student gets tense as soon as he sees the question about that particular portion. Being more anxious could result in palpitations and he may not put forth the answer. Instead if the student had just understood the idea and concept then it would have been easy for him to put forth and develop in his own words too which may actually be an expressive thought and eventually fetch him more marks. Take an other example of a research student. A research paper to be completed needs lots of information which should be compiled properly to meet the requirements of the research study. For this to happen, students try to gather a lot of information and materials,take notes,read. establish in mind how to put in orders needs lots of ideas. Only if he can understand the basic concept of that particular subject or paper can he develop new ideas which will fetch him good notes to complete a research paper eventually winning praise for his work which shows confidence. This will be very useful for the student if he is asked to deliver a paper presentation,because he has already understood the concept and the basic idea which has given him the confidence to express and deliver in a public gathering. Another example could also be taken which was proved, which isNewton's Law of Gravity. Just because Newton had the capacity to understand his topic to be invented his thought process welcomed the idea and thus the Law of Gravity was exposed to the world. If he had just learned the fact probably till now the law of fraud wouldnt have been in existence.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Responsibility plays a big role in our life, especially for older people. when a young child is having fun and he doesn't care about money, home and issues that happen to any person. Young people think that they still have good health but when they get older their health will start to go down. I agree with young people who want to have more fun than older people for a couple of reasons. First of all, responsibility as I mentioned in the beginning, makes any person think about how to make his life more confident and never think about how to enjoy life except after finishing everything he wanted to do. For example in any family, the father always thinks about how to get money for his children, the mother looks after the children and tries to help her husband financially. If we look at the children, we can notice that they want to play everyday and have fun without thinking about anything. That was a good example of showing the difference in how young and old people act. The second reason is that old people always start to take care of their health which absolutely goes down as they get older. On the other hand, young people think about no responsibility and no problems with their health, so why don't they enjoy their lives before anything happens in the future. For example, if someone is 60 years old and he is retired from his job, he could have health problems and refuse him to enjoy his life.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Nowadays, the most used way to get around is by car. From the eighteenth century when the first car was produced, many changes have occurred in the car market and in the ways to use this kind of transport. Since the past, people have needed to move from one place to another place. For this reason some kinds of transport have beeninvented, for example train, bus, airplane and car. The growth of cities made the need for people to find a way to get around the city in an easy way, so they can get to work or to school, for that, personal transport is needed and the car is a personal one. Thus even more people bought cars to move. Nevertheless cars produce a lot of pollution that contributes to damage to the atmosphere in which we live. But at the present day, there is much more awareness about this problem, so many people are finding some ways to reduce the use of cars, for example using carpooling, or using public transport. In conclusion, at the present day there are a lot of cars that produce a lot of pollution, but I think that man is more conscious of this problem now than he was in the past, so i think that there will be fewer cars in twenty.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: These days, many technology systems are developed. For example, we could play in many ways these days like playing an X-box in their houses and going to the movie theatre. On the other hand, old people might not have a chance to play or watch the movie at the theatre with their friends. Not only playing to enjoy life, we could also find our new jobs easily and find their habits easily through the internet explorer. First of all, many young people these days play X-box in their house. Probably in the old days, they just played outside of sports like basketball or soccer. However, these days, we can play soccer or basketball in our house using an X-box. The new technology systems affect us in many ways. For example, we are allowed to talk to someone anywhere and at any time we want. By calling or e-mailing each other, we could find an enjoyable life. In addition, many young people these days also go to the movie theatre to watch the movies. In the movie theatre, we could choose the movie we want to watch. For instance, scary movies and sad movies. By watching them we could have a fun time in our spare time. Also while we watch the movie we can also eat any foods we want. In the old days, they didn't have any movies, so probably they all watched the news all the time.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: Traditionally, many people, including those who are going to advertise their own products, believe that advertisements make products seem much better than they are and this enhanced image from the advertisements helps to increase the sales of the products. However, my opinion is that this common sense does not always make sense. The chief reason for my view is that ill-manufactured advertisements could have bad effects on the product image or sales performances. If information about a certain product which a customer wants to know from the advertisement is not provided in the advertisement, most customers may forget the product after looking at the advertisements. Moreover, many advertisements could not succeed in focusing on the characteristics which the customer wants to catch in the advertisements. The other reason for my view is that core value or quality of product could not be invented even though most famous artists or advertisement agents manufacture the advertisement. Real value or real qualities could be diffused by other types of advertisements such as blogs on the internet, word of mouth, or articles in the newspapers or magazines. Some might argue that even though an advertisement could be ill-manufactured or create different effects expected, most advertising could create productive effects. But there are many examples that show how severe the effects the ill-manufactured advertisements had had. For example, a car manufacturer's advertisement puts a stress on more security-guaranteed facilities in a small car. But most prospective small car customers want to know how much the price of the new small car will be because most prospective customers will use that car as a second car and already strengthen big cars. In sum, I concur with the opinion that advertising could have good effects on the product's image or sales growth.

Real value or real qualities could be diffused by other types of advertisements such as blogs on the internet, word of mouth, or articles in the newspapers or magazines. Some might argue that even though an advertisement could be ill-manufactured or create different effects expected, most advertising could create productive effects. But there are many examples that show how severe the effects the ill-manufactured advertisements had had. For example, a car manufacturer's advertisement puts a stress on more security-guaranteed facilities in a small car. But most prospective small car customers want to know how much the price of the new small car will be because most prospective customers will use that car as a second car and already strengthen big cars.", "In sum, I concur with the opinion that advertising could have good effects on the product's image or sales growth."]

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: This statement is not always true. For example, if you talk with a young boy exhausted by the others or with an older man that travels a lot you revaluate the argument. Anyway the sentence is true in the major parts of situations. For young people it is easier to enjoy life. There are many attractions, places, events for them than for older people. Young people can go to a disco to dance, they have no problems with money, they can go on holiday and find new friends more easily. They don't have any real problems or very difficult situations. They don't care about the future and so they can live in the present completely. The most important thing is that they are thoughtless and indipendent.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: In my opinion successful people are more related to trying new things but they are not necessarily more attracted totaking risks. The reason for my thinking is that people who are successful normally lead a company or are the owner of some kind of business. Therefore they have responsibility for many employees who are working in the firm. For example when the boss of a company wants to develop a new, lets say, a new car. The car works with new technology which is much better for the environment but is not tested well yet and will probably not make much money. In my opinion the business leader should not take the risk of developing the car until it has been well known in a country and has reached high interest. Because if it does not work and nobody will buy the car the company will eventually be lost and the employees would be unemployed. Nevertheless I think that successful people are more willing to try new things. They probably develop new things and also give impulses for the future. That means that they are pre- thinkers of future ideas. In spite of my opinion I could imagine that there are successful people who take risks. These people normally are very self-confident and assure of themselves because they do not care about the people who depend on their decisions.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: Personally, I do prefer to travel by myself. Traveling with a group has limitations that I think reduce your experiences in a place you have never been to before. Everytime a person is led by a guide, his preferences or opinions are more likely to be affected by other people 's opinions and, also are predeterminated by a person that already has a point of view based on his own experiences. When a person travels on his own, the only way to enjoy the travel is to always be aware of the world around you, because it is a new place and your senses are open to any movement. It is exciting because if you don't take care of the things around you, bad experiences will happen easily. From this perspective, there is not doubt that traveling in groups is much better.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: There are some reasons to believe that young people enjoy life more than older people do but, personally, i think that nowadays it isn't so. In my opinion young people want to enjoy their life but they want a lot of things and the result is that they never feel happy. On the other hand old people, actually not very older, have a good experience of enjoying their life with a lot of things. I believe this because they have a lot of possibilities, such as more free time than young people and more money. I think that in this society money is very important for everything because it helps you to enjoy your life. For example you can go on holiday where youwant. Instead young people can't because they need an allowance from parents and they must go to school. So they can't go on holiday where they want. Also this topic depends on the behaviour of people because there are a lot of different characters. In my experience i'm sure that my life is more interesting today than when i was very young.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: We can consider life as a huge playing area where there are so many both dangerous and good things and where sometimes,we are not able to do everything because we are limited. If we take the case of enjoying life,there is a huge contrast between the way old people enjoy life and young people do. Young people,for instance, a child would be the happiest person ever,if her mother buys her the candy she wants yet an old person would be the happiest person ever if she sees her children,coming to visit her,calling her or going somewhere peaceful maybe. As all of us know, it is inevitable that young people are not as experienced as old people so that they dare more and they behave more freely. The older one gets,the less he or she enjoys life.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Many people have different opinions on whether young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities. In my opinion, most students do not spend time helping their society. First, the students do not like to help their communities. Second, most of them do not have enough time. I will explain in detail. To begin with, young people spend time computer gaming. As long as the Internet is developed, they are interested in the game of computers. Let me take my experience as an example. My school all together go to the federal organization for poor people. However, I have not helped poor people alone. Next, young people will not have enough time to help the poor people of their society. This is because our country's young people are busy studying hard. Also their schools also want to be damaged by spending time helping their communities.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I agree that the means and ways of helping in a community have changed, but I totally disagree that young people do not give enough time to helping the community and society in general. A group of people coming together on a shared idea or opinion is called a community. Before the advent of the internet, people had to be physically present to be in the community, now it is not so. I think that with the exponential increase in which young users are releasing the benefits of the internet, there is a lot of time to create, expand and cherish the communities. Information age has given us more communities than there were any previously. If you just browse yahoo. com and orkut. com, you will find a community already present in which you are interested. Be it music, software, movies, entertainment, fund raising and so on. Young people not only create these communities but also make sure that they take active part in them by updating the latest and removing the rest. with the increasing number of users help is ensured to be given to the needed. Also, In today's world where people are living in high-rise buildings, I am sure every member of each house in the apartment will come together to form a committee, to atleast make sure that they know each other. when they come together they also find ways in which to solve each others' problems. Youngsters who care about society will make sure that community festivals are held with their utmost diligence. for example the Ganesh chaturiti festival in India, there are more young people than old ones and the festival is celebrated with full vigor and enthusiasm. In a typical college environment, there are many communities formed by young people who make sure that many weaker students get the necessary additional help that is needed. Communities can only exist if there is a shared interest, but now a days there are so many choices and as young minds change every now and then we think that they are not helping the community in which they have taken part.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I do not agree that Young people enjoy life more than older people do. I can not support this idea for two interesting reasons. First of all, young people have less free time than old people do. Think about the development stages of a human life chronically. When they are students, every day is full of something to do mandatarily such as homework, tutorials, lessons. Also young parents are so hectic almost everyday earning money, working house chores, taking care of children and being social to survive the difficulties which come into their lives. Just during the holidays they can relax and enjoy some time, then they have to struggle again after those certain times. It is hard even to think of themselves and their lives for a short time. On the contrary, old folks are quite often seen taking a walk, reading substantial books, playing golf, cruising on a beautiful ship and so on. Second, young people have less money than old people do. Actually young group makes a lot more money than the other one.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: The author says that the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide. In my opinion,i prefer travelling alone than travelling with a group of people. The reasons are talked about below. firstly,the goal of my travelling is to relax. I would not like to plan it typically and would like to go somewhere i really like. If i can choose i will stay in one place for enough time. After hard work,people want to relax and do not like to obey the schedules. For example,when you asked one whether he or she would like to plan their leisure time. Many of them will say no and give the answer to stop the telephone going somewhere one likes,no guide ,no many people ,quiet,really relaxed. People do not like to bring a schedule into their leisure time. Because the hard days Secondly, travelling alone is a popular method in the world and people can explore new places than the old ones. We really like going to new places rather than old places. But travelling with a group does not meet the need. People like adventures. For example,in china there are many famous places just like the Great wall and the Summer Palace. If somebody chooses the group to travel to the famous places,he or she will be disappointed because there are so many people in the Great wall that one can not have a good look at it. On the other hand ,when one walks alone and chooses the best days,he or she will please themselves with the great picture of nature. Thirdly,the tour guide is somewhat troublesome. He or she always leads the group of people to the shopping mall buying many things that the tour people do not really want. The exact time of the visit is short and one can not have pleasure with the visit. It is a question that someone travelling with a group can meet. And many people do not like that. Last but not the least,there are many benefits to travelling with a group by a tour guide.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I both agree and disagree that young people enjoy life more than older people do. Young people have more energy to do fun things. Older people already experience their frustrated lives. Although young people have more chances to explore the world than old people do, they also have more opportunities to face frustration than elderly people do. Young people have more energy to do fun things. My parents always tell me that "go explore the outside world when you are still young". Young people only have one advantage and it is their young age because they do not have any wealth and experience.

Young people have more energy to do fun things. My parents always tell me that "go explore the outside world when you are still young". Young people only have one advantage and it is their young age because they do not have any wealth and experience. Young people can enjoy their lives by exploring the outside world and trying many new things. We young people enjoy our life differently than older people do. Young people have to use the advantage of energy to explore more or we will regret it when we are old. Older people already experience their frustrated lives. After getting old, they will have merry lives if they persist in being healthy. Elders do not need to do anything for their lives, they can sleep late, read newspapers, watch TV, play golf, spend time with their grandchildren and do everything they expect to do during their free time. Older people can enjoy their lives by having a lot of free time. Elders can use this advantage to spend more time with their families before Jesus comes for them. Although young people have more chances to explore the world than old people, they also have more opportunities to face frustration than elderly  people.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I disagree with the statement that young people enjoy life more than older people do. As a matter of fact, people who are open-minded ,manage their time well and work hard, regardless of age or youth, can enjoy their life without questions. A bright and vigorous young person may have more curiosities than older people to explore the world.
sents: ['I disagree with the statement that young people enjoy life more than older people do. As a matter of fact, people who are open-minded ,manage their time well and work hard, regardless of age or youth, can enjoy their life without questions.', 'A bright and vigorous young person may have more curiosities than older people to explore the world.']

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I agree with this statement of course. Nowadays young people are not involved in helping their own community. For me the problem is young people's education and our modern way of life. In fact in modern society the most important thing is success , and the first thing that is related to this is certainly the idea of competition. Since we were children everyone (parents, relatives, friends, teachers) has taught us that the only thing that is important is to be the best. A good example is a football match where for everyone the only goal is victory, and participation and meeting with other people is not important. So we tend to see our social life in this way too. We don't have to help the community where we live, we only have to fight against the others and try to be the best one.

Since we were children everyone (parents, relatives, friends, teachers) has taught us that the only thing that is important is to be the best. A good example is a football match where for everyone the only goal is victory, and participation and meeting with other people is not important. So we tend to see our social life in this way too.", "We don't have to help the community where we live, we only have to fight against the others and try to be the best one."]

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: In my opinion, there could be great success for people who have an inclination to do things differently from others. Although some might say such people tend to have failure because of the high risk, I think that most of them have success in terms of their personal achievements. I prefer the idea that people should try to do their best within their ability and resources. And, even if they fail, I think they have had their own success. This success means that breaking our own limitations could be happiness for people. For example, there was a man, who quit a big company and started a small coffee shop. Even though he was so enthusiastic about making the shop profitable, he eventually went bankrupt.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: In my opinion, there could be great success for people who have an inclination to do things differently from others. Although some might say such people tend to have failure because of the high risk, I think that most of them have success in terms of their personal achievements. I prefer the idea that people should try to do their best within their ability and resources. And, even if they fail, I think they have had their own success. This success means that breaking our own limitations could be happiness for people. For example, there was a man, who quit a big company and started a small coffee shop. Even though he was so enthusiastic about making the shop profitable, he eventually went bankrupt. I saw, however, in some magazine which covered his fragrance story, that the man said he felt so happy because I could know my limitations. I think that knowing your own limit could be a success since it could be helpful for people to have a good life in their future. And, it could be too easy to do what others can do easily. In this circumstance, even though people can have some profit, I can not say it is success.

text: In my opinion, there could be great success for people who have an inclination to do things differently from others. Of course, followers can have great success.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: Yes, I do agree with the statement stated below. Having broad knowledge of many subjects is better than having knowledge in one subject. Because, every subject in the academic year is related to the other subjects. As we know, MATHEMATICS is the father of all subjects. It has a major influence on all other subjects. There is no such subject which does not have an influence on it. having a knowledge of it only one can have the knowledge of the other subjects completely. For example, in our Bachelor's degree, we have the subjects MOBILE COMMUNICATIONS and WIRELESS COMMUNICATIONS. Each have the influence on the other. Mobile communication is the study of the science of wireless transmissions, whereas wireless transmission is the path for the mobile transmission.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: Most people like travelling all over the world and every one has his own personality which is different from others. they have to think about how they will speed up time and make a plan for that. I disagree with travelling in a group led by a tour guide because maybe he has different interests and there is no time for rest. first, travelling in a group led by a tour guide is not always good because i have my opinion about which place i prefer to visit for a long time in one place. for example, five years ago i went on a group tour from Germany to France but i did not find any time to visit my favourite place because i have to follow the leader in addition we are very different in age. so i will not travel with a group leader. Second, there is a special time for us to visit many places and i have to follow the guide and listen to him so you can not rest if you like this or that place because he has a plane for the trip. while travelling in a group led by a tour guide, it is good to see many things in a short time and with a person who has knowledge but it is nice to do what you want with out any bother.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: In my opinion it is more important for students to understand concepts than to study or learn the facts pertaining to the subjects. I have experienced a lot of problems with this matter in my childhood days when i usually concentrated more on the facts than ideas and concepts. One such experience occurred in my tenth class where i usually learn facts about my subjects such as physics,social studies,mathematics before exams. By the time, I am ready to write the exam i usually forget most of the answers or facts which i learned earlier and get less marks in the exam. My friend of mine on the contrary, usually concentrates on ideas and concepts in physics,social subjects and he is able to reproduce successfully what he learned in exams without any trouble. Another experience i faced was when i was writing the entrance exam for an Engineering course,where i concentrated more on formulas and principles related to mathematics and did not concentrate on ideas and concepts. Due to tension in the exam i was unable to recall the formulas that i learned and ended up with a low score in the exam. However for undergraduate students it is not necessary to understand ideas and concepts pertaining to their subjects because the undergraduate course is four years so it is hard to remember ideas and concepts for various subjects.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Some people say that young people nowadays give enough time to helping their communities, because they have time to help their communities. But I do not think so. I have some reasons for this. Firstly, young people are too busy and selfish. Their time is occupied by their schedule. For example, in Japan, my country, the number of people going to schools has been increasing at a high speed, because the quantity of things for teaching public schools in Japan has been cut. In their school, they cannot learn enough knowledge. Moreover, many young people are always playing with their friends or are always staying at home despite not having anything to do. For those reasons, I think, they do not want/can not help. Secondly, recently, the opportunity for having relationships in their communities is decreasing. In particular, in urban areas, the connection between people is very weak. For instance, my friend has never participated in events of her communities, such as a Japanese festival, instead of only seeing them. My home town is suburban. So I often take part in Japanese festivals. Of course, all members of my family do, also, at the least half of the population of my town do, too. So I disagree with the idea that young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.

I have some reasons for this. Firstly, young people are too busy and selfish. Their time is occupied by their schedule. In their school, they cannot learn enough knowledge. Moreover, many young people are always playing with their friends or are always staying at home despite not having anything to do. title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: Nowadays, the advertisements play such an important role in the marketing of the product even if the product is bad for the consumer or if it has bad quality. The advertisements make the products look good, thats why the advertisements are created, and to induce the customer to buy the product. The advertisements are a way to persuade people to buy things that other people do. Everything is about fashion nowadays and thats why people are accustomed to buying things that are commonly used by all people, like a new pair of shoes or a new cellphone model. The advertisements appear everywhere people go because the industries want to make their product well known in the area where they are doing the campaign. An example of products that use alot of marketing are all the soda industries. Like Coca Cola or Pepsi both of these businesses use lots of advertisements that say that their product is better than the other. Another example of this is the tobacco industry, because the advertisements that they do of cigarettes tell people that they should smoke and they dont tell that the product is harmful to health. The advertisements are every where like on the radio, on  the Internet and in cars that are carrying product stickers or models with the product. But all the time the advertisements make the product look really good even though the product is bad or harmful to your health. The industries only care about selling they dont care about the quality of the product, an example of this is the products that say that they can stop hair loss These products have such advertisements that some people fall in their tails to buy them even if the hair loss continues there is only a waste of money and time. But the advertisements improve the appearance of the appearance of the product.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Although many people say that we will not use cars anymore in the future, cars will still be necessary tools even in the future. Namely. cars will still prevail. For this purpose, I don't agree that there will be fewer cars in twenty years. Here comes discussion. In the first place, Cars are great inventions. There are a variety of them and they help us a lot; for example, transportation- both humans and cargoes. Besides, they save time. We benefit from cars very much. Undeniably, convenient as cars contribute, we can not ignore the negative impact they have ; say, the exhaust and energy consumption. However, scientists are now trying to figure out some alternative solutions such as biodiesel. Using biological sources, cars will not cause environmental problems. Since new technology has been developing at a breathtaking speed, I am optimistic about the future. In my opinion, cars will exist, maybe changing into another form, but they will always exist. After all, we can't live in a world with cars.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: The media of today is a very powerful tool. In other words the media is the king of the world. Whatever is shown in the television, in the newspapers and in the magazines is greatly influencing the public. Children and even some adults get carried away by their tactics. The influence may be negative or positive. I believe that they sometimes mislead people. Thus i completely agree that the advertisements make the products seem much better than they are. Adversitements that are in forms of writing on paper or those seen visually on the television are very different from those that they actually show or tell us. Firstly the products shown in these advertisements are not what they actually show us. Lets take the example of medicines. The advertisements in a mere ten to fifteen seconds try to explain to us what it should be taken and what it should be avoided. They may inform us that they do wonders for , like lets take an example of a patient with some heart disease. They may tell us that they can help cure or treat high cholesterol in just one month and also tell us that you don't need to follow a diet. But scientifically how can a high cholesterol be cured in a month and that without having a diet?Thus i believe that these can be misleading Sometimes they may tell us that any kind of skin problem be it on the face or any other part of the body can be taken care of. They may use the words like " magical cream ". The patients may believe them. They may use them but in vane. Actually this is just a tactic they follow to fool us. Lets take another example of a " hair remover cream ". The advertisements may show a beautiful girl with no hair on her face or legs. She would say. " for a silky skin like mine use so and so cream ". The irony is that they already have a girl who had no hair on her face or legs. So they are not trying to mislead people.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree with the statement that young people enjoy life more than older people. Young people look at the world in a different way when compared to older people. Young people have the opportunity to mould their life in the way they want. I feel that young people are persistent and are more confident. Young people look on the world as a sphere containing numerous opportunities. They have the tendency to prepare for the future and achieve their goals through hard work. Young people are more energetic unlike older people. This helps young people to fulfill their goals. For instance, a boy at seventeen can aspire to become a pilot and even accomplish it through his hardwork and energy. This may be difficult for older people because the response to any kind of situation like moving the accelerator hard reduces with the passage of time. Moreover,young people are more persistent. They think that they should respect their elders and should not hurt their feelings in any way. On the other hand,older people need not respect their younger ones and have the right to behave as they wish.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I disagree with the stated idea. I think there will be more cars in use in twenty years from now. Cars have been one of the indispensable means of transportation since they were invented. And even though there have been many other transportation systems developed, such as the subway and airplanes, cars have never been out of people's lives. Instead of being replaced by other transportation systems, they have changed to better versions continuously. Moreover, some people are very interested in buying or collecting old versions of popular cars, like the classic model of the  Beatles ". Cars may be considered just as a means of moving. But the purpose of owning a car has changed over time, and nowadays some want cars to show their life style and personalities. For this reason, there will be more cars in the future. However, it's possible that new and better means of transporting will be invented in the future, but I believe that cars will be developed to be a better means than now. As we've been doing this for a long time, we can find better resources for power, and also better designs for cars. Also there will be more cars considering people 's tastes today. Living in a modern world, many people prefer to stay private wherever possible and want to feel at home whenever possible. At that point, cars are the best way to choose. I predict that fancier, more comfortable, faster, and safer means of moving than cars will appear in twenty years.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: It is important for the students to understand the ideas and concepts and also to learn the facts about those ideas. This is because only knowing the ideas doesn't help them to understand the theories accurately. The facts help them to get the live ideas of the theories they study. For example if we consider the lightening and the sound which will occur during the time of rain gives them the idea that the sound is heard before the light appears. This is the idea that every student knows. But the fact behind it is that the sound travels faster than the light so it happens as such.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: An education system based on unchangable knowledge, leads students to learn these ideas; and this undesirable situation will continue for a long time and it seems to pass over into the next centuries. In spite of the fact that it is the most important and preferable choice to learn the facts instead of learning the same ideas and concepts all the time, it is necessary for students to be successful in their class, and also many teachers don`t open new facts in the world. First of all, for many students, it is quite important to succeed in their lesson; so it motivates them in a way that they should learn ideas and concepts instead of facts. The education system in our country is also the same. Many of my friends try to learn something that is given in a classroom and do not give any importance to searching for facts about that subject. It is enough for them to know the idea, and other aspects of that area are not necessary. This reality is not something appreciated, but systems make people behave in such a way. Another aspect of this choice is based on some teachers who are quite old and still try to teach and give lessons to students. They don` t want to learn new innovents in the world, and try to create students in a way they know and think. If students don't lead the same way, their teachers always criticize them and don't threaten them in a nice way; therefore many students feel upset and it will affect their study life badly. In conclusion, it is more important to understand ideas instead of facts to be more successful in this education system, and also to get teachers to admire you.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I am in accordance with the statement that successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well. title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: The population of the world is growing day by day. According to this, the needs of the people change. I think, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today if people make the good decision in twenty years. Nowadays, the number of cars is increasing and most people use their own cars to go somewhere. By using their own cars, they waste lots of time. Apart from using their own cars, I think they will try to find new ways to get somewhere quickly. For example, in a long vacation, people will start to use planes instead of cars. Because travelling by plane causes them to gain time. Nowadays, in our country we can see examples of that. Most people prefer to go on vacation in their personal cars.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: The population of the world is growing day by day. According to this, the needs of the people change. I think, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today if people make the good decision in twenty years. Nowadays, the number of cars is increasing and most people use their own cars to go somewhere. By using their own cars, they waste lots of time. Apart from using their own cars, I think they will try to find new ways to get somewhere quickly. For example, in a long vacation, people will start to use planes instead of cars. Because travelling by plane causes them to gain time. Nowadays, in our country we can see examples of that. Most people prefer to go on vacation in their personal cars. But when the plane companies make the tickets cheaper and give people the opportunity to use the plane, people begin to use the plane instead of the car. The other reason why the car numbers will be fewer is the traffic. The traffic problem gets bigger and bigger each day. This problem makes people nervous and it takes much more time to reach a place than it can take. They should try to find alternative ways to go somewhere to reduce the traffic jams. The other important reason is reduction in the amount of petrolium. We know that petrol is very valuable and the amount of it decreases day by day. After some time, petrol will be difficult to find. In this time, people will use cars which work with different products or they will try to use their cars less. For people, using their own car is much more comfortable.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Indeed, many successful people in history were willing to try new things and take risks, but do all successful people try new things and take risks? I don't think so. I think successful people are the ones who are top in their field. If he or she can do one thing best, he or she will be a successful person. From this point of view, successful people do not always have to try new things and take risks. We see some who do something new and succeed, so that we say successful people "always" try new things and take risks.

We will say that, because we only see the successful ones. We have little chance of the failed one. Trying new things and taking risks also means high probability of failure. Therefore, many people prefer to spend their time on what is already known. and they work hard so that they can outbeat their rivals. Also, only the "try" is not enough. We have to spend more time and energy to improve the invitation. And the improvement part is more annoying and complicated. If he or she is one who is only willing to spend their time finding or inviting something new, but too lazy to improve it, he or she will not succeed. On the other hand, if there is a person who is willing to work hard to find the improving ways, one is more likely to succeed than the original investor or finder. Take Japan for example. The  Americans invite cars, but they don't spend time improving cars.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Many young people enjoy their life, but not every one enjoys it. Many people fail their life and do not enjoy their life. The happiness of life depends on what people do in their life to be happy and whether the people are satisfied with the result. The statement that young people enjoy life more than older people do can not be true in all situations. Most people have bad things happen in their life. It could happen at any stage of life. Some people have more than one bad memory which causes them to suffer a lot of distress and depression. Many teenagers have a great number of stresses caused by academic, and social problems. Many teenagers get too many stresses and sometimes, those stresses lead to suicide. On the other hand, old people, who retired or are almost retired have nothing to worry about, but their health. Worry is one of the biggest causes of diseases. the body does not function well when people worry too much. Old people don't have a lot to worry about.

Many teenagers get too many stresses and sometimes, those stresses lead to suicide. On the other hand, old people, who retired or are almost retired have nothing to worry about, but their health. Worry is one of the biggest causes of diseases. the body does not function well when people worry too much.', "Old people don't have a lot to worry about."]

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: The phrase quoted "YOUNG PEOPLE NOWADAYS DO NOT GIVE ENOUGH TIME TO HELPING THEIR COMMUNITIES" is a factor that lots of adults think may be true. But, I totally disagree with this. The youth of today are very enthusiastic about their given responsibility, their job & their concerns regarding the work that they need to put forth. In this fast paced life of today, with severe competition that comes along from every corner of their life, this makes it impossible for young people to dedicate much time toward their community or to take any social cause they want to do.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I agree partly. The whole situation changes from time to time and through globalization there have been a lot of important changes in society. Young people definitely have more possibilities to spend their free time on things they really like and therefore one could easily say that there is a big change in the behaviour of young people. Furthermore life becomes faster and that is why everybody, not only young people, has to think better about how and why they do the things they do and if it is the best they can do. Besides that it differs from age, religion and place in society how active or passive young people are in their communities. My own experiences are that I myself help a lot in my community and lots of my friends do so too. An other point one has to have in mind is how young people feel in the community. If they are happy with the world around them the help of young people is logical, but if they have no friends and fun at work it is logical that they are not willing to help the community and prefer to sit in their room next to the computer or television. Besides that the government could try to make help and work of young people more public, so that young people can see, that they can help and perhaps can have a better feeling throughout that, what they have done. For me it would be important to show which goals young people can achieve. Finally it seems as if young people are lazy and do not give enough time to help their community, but in my opinion nothing has changed and nothing will change.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: During their all long period of education and graduation, students are learning many things on different topics and are developing many skills. That gives them the opportunity to improve some of them. Is that more important for a student to understand what he is learning, or just to keep things in mind without any explanations or added value ? On the one hand, I think that it is essential for a student to understand what is being taught to him for the simple evidence that he will better keep it in mind. If we take the example of an economic classroom, it will be more efficient for the student to understand the concept of " liberalism" for instance by understanding the way it works and its features, than just knowing the fact that this is an economic way in opposition to others as " socialism". But on the other hand, it is sometimes difficult for a student to understand every aspect of an idea or a concept. This made the fact that some students are tough in one area and weak in an other one. In this case it would be a better way for the student just to learn his class without any more understanding, just like a robot.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: I do not agree that the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide. There are many disadvantages to following the tour guide. Even getting a tour guide can be harmful and dangerous for tourists. First of all,when you follow the tour guide to see around the city which you want to see and travel,you can only see places in which the tour guide shows you and your group. You can not find out around the city. Everytime there are some limitations which are made by the tour guide. For example,you want to see the other side of the city,but there is a certain travel program which includes seeing certain places in the city. You have to follow the travel program. Secondly,People who are from that city can understand that you are a tourist. This system has some difficulties. They can cheat on you or sell kind of present things to you much more expensively. For example,when you go to a store for shopping,if they understand that you are a foreigner or a tourist they can try to sell many things much more expensive,but if you travel alone and you can speak the language of that country which you want to see they can not understand that you are a foreigner or a tourist. So people who are from that country or that city can sell things to you for the original price. Third of all, traveling with groups is not an expensive activity but it is also very dangerous. There are many terrorist people or groups who want to kidnap tourists and foreign people to come true their bad purposes. Those kinds of people can realize that you are a tourist,because you are travelling with the group and following the tour guide. They can kidnap you and kill you. Furthermore they can use you for their purposes. That situation happened with tourists many times. Those people killed the tourists or got money from the tourists of the family.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I do not agree that life is more enjoyable for young people than for elderly people. It is not a fact which is proved scientifically that young people enjoy life more than older people do. As for me, when you get older you will learn what kind of facilities and activities make you happy or unhappy. Because of experiencing more than younger  people, being older has lots of advantages. Firstly, young people are more interested in trying new things. But it is not sure that they will enjoy what they do. They will experience an action to learn something. Sometimes this can lead young people to be unhappier than before. On the other hand, when you become older, I am sure that you will be more clear about new things. Moreover, when somebody gets older, he or she generally becomes what sort of actions change the mood positively. As a result of these experiences, old people get a better time though they have fewer times to live than young people have. Secondly, the ages lived teach people to be more patient. That is why older people tend to insist on doing something even though they were very unsuccessful at it before.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I agree that it is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts. Here are three reasons to support my agreement. The first reason is that the idea is the most important one of everything. Only when you know the main idea about it, can you think about more details and ask more questions. Furthermore, the concepts are the main body of the lesson or something like that. You should understand the concepts and after that you can learn other information. For example, if a student can't understand the idea and concepts of the chapter in accountingclass, he doesn't know what this chapter istalking about. Then, he gained nothing on accounting class. The worst thing is that he will fail the course. The second reason is that understanding is more basic than learning. You can learn something after your understanding. For instance, in order to learn how to read, you should understand what reading means. It means you should see the words in the paper and say them. Therefore,you must gain the idea and concepts of reading. After understanding those, you can learn other things such as different kinds of reading methods and how to read. Moreover, when people are talking about reading, the first thing that appears in your brain is the meaning of reading. It is the basic one. The third reason is that ideas and concepts are always put in front of the book such as an outline. You can know what the author mainly mentions in the book because of the ideas and concepts. Then, you can read the book from the first page to the end and learn the details and facts. Generally speaking, it is normal when you read books and learn them. On the whole, you can't learn the details and facts without having known about the ideas and concepts. It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts. Sometimes, it is enough for them to know ideas and concepts. There is no need to learn facts.
