title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Here are some of the funny things now. Some people think young people enjoy life more than older people do. Others do not support it. In the following , I give my own opinions about the topic. Obviously, it is a hard question to speak. In my opinion,it all depends. Yonug people are always energetic. Enjoying life for them is doing playing. They can do amazing cool things that the older can not take,such as playing tense games ,travelling to many beautiful places away from hometown. In short, they have the ability to take part in physical working things ,which is not available to the elderly. Now , whether the older is not enjoying life? The key makes sure that is wrong. Compared with young people's energy, the older would not have any advantages.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I think this is an interesting statement. I can give a direct testimonial of a successful person that I know very well and of whom I know how he works: this person is my father. Mr. Dario (I love calling him by name) is at the moment the General Director of CARIPE bank, a bank that is included in the BPI group. I think that to arrive at this level one person always has to take risks not only "rather than only doing what he already knows how to do well". And I tell this not only at work level, but at personal level too. I'll explain this: we live in Ravenna, a city in northern Italy. Now I'm in Barcelona for my erasmus experience but normally I study in Milan which is far from Ravenna. To do this work, my father had tried a new type of life. Every week, for 5 days a week, he goes away from home and lives on his own in Pescara, the city where the center of the bank is located. The decision that has caught my father, I think, is the most difficult choice that a man with a brilliant career from one part and a good and lovely family from the other can take. The distance from Pescara and Ravenna is 450 km but my father spends the maximum time that he can find at home. For maximum time I mean the week end but a total week end. To return to Pescara he starts on Monday morning at five a. m.

To return to Pescara he starts on Monday morning at five a.', 'm.']

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Some people think that young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities. According to me this statement is true but not all young people do not give a helping hand to their communities. I live in a university college. My friends and I are very busy with exams, classes and laboratories. For example we are at university from 8. 00 am to 6. 30  pm00 pm all day! So we returned to college very, very tired! However, when we go back to college we find time to help our community. For example some students work in the college's garden, others help our secretary in the office, others help in the kitchen and so on. I think that if you believe in something you will find time to do it. I know, other students in my college do not help the community because they are out all day and go back to the college only for dinner. They tell us that they have not time because they study all day. But this is not a good reason, according to me. I have to study too! I want to pass all the exams and degrees soon but I am in a college with other people and so I want to help my community because I think it is a right thing. Today young people are busy with not important activities and so they have not time for important things, such as helping the community.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Nowadays, young people can get much more information than before. Sometimes, they get too much information and too many things have to do or read, because they have to spend their time staying at home or working. Young people have no time to help their communities because of their busy and irresponsible  lifestyles. First, young people will be forced to study and learn other skills such as playing piano or guitar. They have to spend their time in classes over eight hours a day. That means, they lost their leisure time to be together with their communities. They don't have any chance to know what happened to their communities and also don't know how to help them. Young people lack time to care about their communities because they don't even have time to prepare their work. Second, young people are not so responsible as old people. For the traditional custom, old people will consider communities as an important role for them. In spite of being busy, they will spend their time in communities and try to help or solve any problems.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: I think being specialised in one specific subject is good, but is not enough for your personal development. First of all, I think it is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects because it is better to improve your communication with people. I mean, if your knowledge is really broad,you will certainly be able to talk about a lot of different subjects with a lot of different people. Being open minded in your knowledge leads you, most of the time, to being open minded socially. It is important to be interested in several things, that shows your ability to adapt yourself to different situations, and i do believe that being able to adapt yourself to a given situation is always a good point; whatever you actually want to do in life. Furthermore, the more you learn, the more you want to learn (and need to learn actually). The desire to learn can be found if you are specializing in one specific subject, but a single subject may lead you to isolate yourself in technical considerations that no one can actually understand, whereas plurality of subjects makes your mind breathe. It is no longer a question of 'academic" knowledge, it is a question of curiosity. According to me, acknowledgement goes the same way as it goes for food, that is to say if you eat the same food everyday, you will just be quickly disgusted. Therefore, if you just study one single subject, even if you go deeply through it, you will be disgusted one day somewhat. To summarize, I think it is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects because you can thus talk about more things, and it makes you so curious as if you were majoring in one specific subject.
sents: ['I think being specialised in one specific subject is good, but is not enough for your personal development. First of all, I think it is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects because it is better to improve your communication with people. I mean, if your knowledge is really broad,you will certainly be able to talk about a lot of different subjects with a lot of different people. Being open minded in your knowledge leads you, most of the time, to being open minded socially. It is important to be interested in several things, that shows your ability to adapt yourself to different situations, and i do believe that being able to adapt yourself to a given situation is always a good point; whatever you actually want to do in life. title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Today each person can have his own car without many problems. Having a car is becoming easier in many ways. So the increase in cars can be considered like an obvious result of modern society. But if we think about the future further there may be a completely different situation waiting for us. There are some elements able to limit the car's increase in future. First of all, the development of telecommunication will definitely decrease the need to move. All texts, data,graphics or even sound elements can be transported by the internet so we won't need to move out to get our office to work. Payment is also getting informatised because we are using credit cards and telebanking systems. All the concepts of our life are becoming non-material and they exist just on the internet's web. Decreasing of transport of materials will reduce the number of cars as a means of transport. These days there aren't many private airplanes but in the future airplanes or another system will replace cars. Technology is very fast changing and progressing. Cars will be one of the materials of the last days we won't use anymore. Soon there will be another system which can fill the lack that a car couldn't complete or who can solve problems that a car was provoking like pollution or accidents. The main reason that I suppose the number of cars has decreased is there are a lot of problems caused by cars.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I do not agree with the statement that young people do not spend time helping their communities at this time. This is not true at all because You can see a lot of young people share their free time in projects to help other people as volunteers for the red cross for example or collect money or food to send to non - developedcountries. People nowadays have more information than before about what is going on around them, in the world. This information is seen on the television, read in the newspaper or on the internet, talking with his friends or colleagues. Another thing is the new technologies that make it possible to communicate with more people and share information faster than you could imagine before about what's happening in a place and the possibility to go to those places are easier. All these things make young people aware of reality and they become aware of problems in their communities and in the rest of the world and try to help in the way they can. I am really surprised when I see young people share their time going to the homes of lonely old people one or two times a week, or when they help in their community to collect food , clothes or money to send to non-developed countries or when some tragedy occurs. I am really proud of these young people because they are the future of the next generation and they made a better world.

People nowadays have more information than before about what is going on around them, in the world. This information is seen on the television, read in the newspaper or on the internet, talking with his friends or colleagues. title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: Knowledge is an important thing for a person's life. According to many people; specializing in one specific topic provides them with several opportunities to express a subject but i strongly believe that having broad knowledge is more advantageous. You can work on many topics; you can demonstrate your knowledge to others and you can improve yourself; First of all; if you are familiar with some kinds of topic; you can easily predict the subject and understand the mainstream. And also you can give a speech about the topic eventhough you dont know everything about thesubject. Secondly academic subjects are related to each other so you can find the transitions and you can realize the connections between the subjects. For example you are a professor at a university and your department is biology but a chemistry professor can not be able to reach school so that you can give a lesson about chemistry by using a relationship between these two subjects. Finally; a person wants to improve himself or herself so it is very important to have broadknowledge. For instance a student asks about an academic topic which is not your specific subject you can give an answer to the student because you know many things about many subjects so that the student may consider that you are a knowledgeableperson. When all the above things are taken into consideration; having broad knowledge or specializing in one subject are not too different from themselves.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: I totally agree with this statement. I agree with this, firstly because I am a forensic scientist, and so during my formation, we had to learn things about all academic branches. For example physics, biology, chemistry, law, etc. But more seriously, it ` s really important to have good instruction, it permits you to express yourself in a lot of conversation and so to speak with a lot of people from various specialities. It is not only useful for public relations, you can use it when you watch TV or read the newspaper, too. Sometimes it`s already really difficult for me to understand what they are talking about on the news on TV. One other thing is that today, with all the media we have, it has become really easy to learn about a lot of academic fields, not really deeply, it`s sure, but sufficiently to understand how the world is going. I can understand people who won`t open their minds to other fields. I am of this kind when you are talking about business or politics. In fact we can`t be interested in everything, but we can interest ourselves in so many things that it would be a shame not to profite fromthis opportunity. Just to put a tragic accent on this essay, we can say that the lack of knowledge is what leads to all the extreme nations our world has known as fascism or really hard communism as in the ancient SovietUnion. In fact, if Hitler had learned to know the Jews and if the inhabitants of the ancient Soviet Union had known what was going on outside the Union, these ``terror`` nations wouldn`t have lived so long! To conclude, the lack of knowledge is nowadays unjustified and it`ll be something bad to not profite from the opportunities we have.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: There are many aspects that are done on the students to make them learn and two essential ways that students follow and do while they are learning. One way is understanding concepts while the other is learning facts. I agree that it is more important for students to get ideas and concepts than learning only the facts without understanding for many reasons like the belief of the subject and acquiring the ability to apply the concepts withunderstanding. If students learn information without understanding how it came, there is the possibility that one day the information will be changed according to the weak understanding of its concepts. For example, I know an old man who thinks that the earth is a sphere and he kept this information to himself for many years. After decades the man changes his mind since he saw proves that the earth is a sphere even though he believed in the past that it was not a sphere!.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I claim learning facts is more important than understanding ideas and concepts. I will explain my idea by using the example of the controversy about article 9 of the Japanese constitution. Just knowing the ideas and concepts does not directly mean we have the understanding of the topic and having the opinion to act on it. Thinking about the controversy over article 9, the argument about whether revising it or not. Surely, understanding its history which has kept our country peaceful for 60 years, and its idea and concept of renouncing war after the tragic memory of Hiroshima and Nagasaki is very important. But by just "understanding" the ideas of inequality of it, we cannot protect ourselves from the threat of terrorism. So what are we needed to live for? We are strongly needed to be "learning" the facts of the Japan facing now, and the ways we can take to maintain the peace. What happens when North Korean missiles are launched into Japan? Do we not fight for it? Or we fight with self defence forces which is well known to be not suitable for the article 9 itself.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: It is hard to predict the number of cars in twenty years. As we can see, technology is emerging greatly. We can assure you this much that public transport will be improved in coming years. But also considering the fact that most people are working and earning well,they prefer to keep their own transport vehicle. Technology improvement confirms that public transport like metro trains,delux buses provide convenient transport for many people. Most people from the middle class or lower class prefer to travel by means of this transport and save their money over the high rate of petrol or diesel. If the government keep on providing this high technology transport or some better transport than we can hope some decline in the number of cars present. Now a days many people are having satisfying jobs. This increase in employment gives a hint that most people will go to have a good salary in future. These kinds of people will not worry about spending money on petrol or buying a car. Cars have become a status symbol for many high class people. Also the low rate of cars is also attracting the middle class. If the rate of cars keeps on decreasing, there will be a chance that in the coming future there will be nothing but cars on the road.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: In my opinion it is important for students to understand ideas and concepts because without them they will never understand the facts. I can explain it much better with an example:if you understand the concept of gravity you can understand why we can' t fly, but if you only know the fact that we can't fly you don't know the concept of gravity. You can understand that there is something more but without some further facts you can' t find the concept. But at the same time facts are very important for a student. We live in a society that forgets the past in a very easy way, the more we go on the more we forget and school is not good at giving us the information. I also know it is difficult to give us all the information because there is so little time but the few arguments that they have chosen for us are not enough. In Italian schools, for example, we study for many years the Preistoric period, the Acient, the Middle age. The Story! But when we finally arrive at study, at the latest year of school, the recent story of the world and of our country we run and at least we arrive at the first period after the Second World War; now we are in 2007 and there are fifty years of facts that we don' t know well and for this we have a not culturate class of people that will govern us. This is only an example to show how facts, in my opinion, are much more important to understand than ideas and concepts also because if you learn much better the facts, from them, you will recognize also the ideas and concepts that are unified to them.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I disagree with this statement. As a young person myself, I really do not have the feeling to enjoy my life as much as I could. Without having any health issues, nor special disabilities that old people might have on a daily basis, I am just so concerned about my future that it does not permit me to appreciate the enjoyment of life. As young people, your entire life is devoted to the preparation of the future and to how to cope with the responsibilities that accompany life as an adult: young people have to obtain a high diploma to get a good job to pay the apartment to have a family and to afford it. This is why a young person might go through his youth without enjoyment. As an example, most students do, during their studies, a job or an internship, to have money for some higher studies or to complete them with professional experience that might be taken into account by their future employer. In such circumstances, how can they enjoy their lives as students? They have no time to go to students' parties, or they are too tired. Besides, most of them are conscious that these years were supposed to be the best, as their parents told them. Young people do not enjoy life like older people do, and they probably enjoy it less than older people do.
sents: ["I disagree with this statement. As a young person myself, I really do not have the feeling to enjoy my life as much as I could. Without having any health issues, nor special disabilities that old people might have on a daily basis, I am just so concerned about my future that it does not permit me to appreciate the enjoyment of life. title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: First of all, I would like to refer to the range of "young people" and "old people". I would like to refer to young people", as university students, and "old people" as those parents. These days, parents, who have sent their children to universities, tend to restart enjoying their own lives. Until high school, a number of parents consider their children as immature. Although, as soon as they enter university, they change their idea that their children are no longer immature. Therefore, after their children are grown up to university students, parents shift their lives to enjoy themselves. I am against the idea that young people enjoy life more than older people do, in terms of studying and relationships between friends. Firstly, young people, who are at universities, have to study a lot. Most of them have lectures everyday, have to make a presentation, or submit reports. On the other hand, old people, have no schools or lectures. They are totally free to spend their free time. Secondly, about relationships between friends. When people go to universities, the first thing they try to do, is make friends. It can be an enjoyable thing, but in return, it might be a stressful thing. They have to seek an opportunity to speak to a new person, and get to know each other. Although, parents, who have already gained a friend, do not need to make new friends. They do not need to experience those stressful times any more. To give a more considerable instance, my mother enjoys more of her life after my entrance to university. She goes out with her best friend more often, goes out with her to see a play, movies, etc. Moreover, she is making more time to spend with her husband. They go out for a drive, or take a walk with our dog. From these facts I can maintain that parents are enjoying their life, as much as university students do, in terms of school affairs and relationships between colleagues.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: There is no doubt that whether young people enjoy more than old people do has become more controversial in today's modern society. As a matter of fact, this issue deals with a lot of different aspects. Specifically, there are no universal answers to this question. Depending on different elements such as social influence, personal interest, educational background etc, the answers of different people may vary greatly. As far as I am concerned, I vote that young people do not enjoy life more than old people. In the following paragraphs, I would like to explain my view from several perspectives. In the first place, the important reason in support of my view is that young people encounter more or at least the same amount of physical problems than older people do.

As far as I am concerned, I vote that young people do not enjoy life more than old people. In the following paragraphs, I would like to explain my view from several perspectives.", 'In the first place, the important reason in support of my view is that young people encounter more or at least the same amount of physical problems than older people do.']

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: There is no doubt that whether young people enjoy more than old people do has become more controversial in today's modern society. As a matter of fact, this issue deals with a lot of different aspects. Specifically, there are no universal answers to this question. Depending on different elements such as social influence, personal interest, educational background etc, the answers of different people may vary greatly. As far as I am concerned, I vote that young people do not enjoy life more than old people. In the following paragraphs, I would like to explain my view from several perspectives. In the first place, the important reason in support of my view is that young people encounter more or at least the same amount of physical problems than older people do. Both scientific study and empirical experience show us that physical problems are in propitious to the technological levels. Therefore, with these problems, young people have to deal with these new problems before they can enjoy their life, namely, they will not have the same opportunities to enjoy life. For example, with the Internet invention, young people have to deal with all the technical problems in constructing the network or in maintaining the network. But, for those older people, they can enjoy their life without thinking about how this new monster brings about the c. In the second place, young people have to bear more social burdens than old people. Social burdens manifest themselves in terms of social changes. For today's young people, let's say in china, society is stagnating into an aging society. With One Child Policy, the country will say one young couple have to support at least four parents or their family members. Accordingly, young people can not have much time to enjoy life as the older people do. In the third place, admittedly, young people could face more opportunities to leave a happy life, for example, the joy that the Internet brings us.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I do not agree at all that young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities. Of course , technology may distract young people and may make them very occupied , but it is not necessary that they do not give enough time to helping their communities. If you look around you and you see the developed projects , it is because of young people and I consider these developments as a help to communities. I think that kindness is not only a financial or tactile thing , I mean that you can also help your community by loving them and giving them a lot of passion. I am a big example to prove that young people are helpful to the community. I am eighteen years old and I am in a medical college. I have alot of subjects to study and a lot of work to do but I work as a volunteer in an orphanage in my country every weekend and every summer holiday. In addition , I think it is a big help if young people help their communities but they do not give enough time for this helping , I mean that there is at least help. For example , my cousin is fond of the Internet , she is always on 24 hours on the computer and searching on the Internet and chatting and having a lot of fun , although , she rarely does benefit web sites which help people in different fields , and because she seldom helps people , I think she is a very helpful person.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I agree. The students should understand the ideas that they are studying. The learning process is not about memorizing chapters and concepts, it is about understanding and analyzing. If they understood the ideas and concepts they would not have problems  learning facts". They would be capable of solving problems, which is the idea. Education is about what the student is capable of doing, For example, if the student has a bad situation, a problem or other struggles, his proof would be to try to find by himself what he needs to do to get out of the situation. His level of education would help him to analyze the problem and then, solve it. This man will think about what he has learned and after that he will find a solution to his problem. Another example, would be a person without any educational qualifications. This person would not be capable of getting a fast concentration because he has not had any educational help in all his life, which means that he has not developed his reading part at school. For this reason, education is not just a word that indicates "go to school" (college or universities, in other cases), it is a word that indicates: "analyzing", "logical" or "learning". If some subject is too difficult for a student but he must pass that subject, he will use his logical skills to solve the problem. The most logical response to this situation would be to go with a tutor to get help. I do not agree with the idea that it is important for students to learn facts because it would be a support to those people who just memorize things and they call themselves smart to themselves.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: That is a difficult question because i think it belongs to different communities. In some regions i would agree with that statement because there are political problems that help to make the problem grow. There you find children who grow up without a father or a mother and no one who cares about the young child. I understand that these children have no interest in helping their communities when they are older because no one helped them. Otherwise it could be that especially, people search in communities for help and if they find some they are pleased to help the community if the help is needed. Furthermore you often find good conditions in wealthy regions. Why? I think they don't have those problems like people who have to work hard for every little thing. These people live through the day without thinking about how they will survive tomorrow. In my eyes young people spend a lot of time helping theircommunity.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: The teachers teach us a lot of different things. They always teach us that understanding the idea and the concepts of each article is more important than learning the facts. Even though we are students or the teachers. First, understanding the ideas and concepts is to make sure that you know everything about this story or article. If you did not understand what it was talking about, you would never get the facts of it. My English teacher always says that way to me. If we want to learn good English, we should read it more than once to understand the idea. It likes the characters, setting, plot, and the background. When we can get all of the above, we will understand the ideas and the concepts. Trying to read it more than once, it would be easier to get what it says in the reading. I always do that way, because I want to get higher marks for every test or quiz. When we do that, we will learn more when we read. Learning the facts is not really a bad thing to learn.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: The mindful body: a peculiar paradigm I think that specializing in one specific subject is better. Specialising in something you can give to your research a peculiar prospect and then increase your field of study. Let me give us some examples based on my experience as an anthropologist. I think they could clearly illustrate what I mean. During my anthropological field work in Cameroon, West Africa, I argued that there were lots of interesting aspects of this African society ( for example kinship, economic or religious systems etc. ). However I Decided to focus my research on witchcraft and sorcery. Observing life in a small village I saw that I could note phenomena of witchcraf in all social fabric. The occult power was used in a social and economic level. Moreover when I wrote my BA`s thesis I used a specific prospective and a peculiar method of analysis. I used the post-modern prospective on hidden cults of japanese Christians and i demonstrated how these hidden cults influenced the modern japanese Christians and other religious movements. I tried to explain just one aspect of African or Japanese society and I tried to explain how these particular aspects reflected on the whole society in different levels. I think that having broad knowledge of many academic subjects is not good or useful.

Specialising in something you can give to your research a peculiar prospect and then increase your field of study. Let me give us some examples based on my experience as an anthropologist. I think they could clearly illustrate what I mean. During my anthropological field work in Cameroon, West Africa, I argued that there were lots of interesting aspects of this African society ( for example kinship, economic or religious systems etc. ). However I Decided to focus my research on witchcraft and sorcery. Observing life in a small village I saw that I could note phenomena of witchcraf in all social fabric. I tried to explain just one aspect of African or Japanese society and I tried to explain how these particular aspects reflected on the whole society in different levels.', 'I think that having broad knowledge of many academic subjects is not good or useful.']

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Being Young There is a common feeling that the best times of our lives are the times that we are young. A human being with his body getting older and older could not be the same person when he was young. It is true that young people enjoy life more than old people,that`s just how our lives are. First of all,the main fact is that an old person could not do the things that a young person can do. Instead of knowing how to enjoy life,there are some limits to what an old man can do. Secondly,as a person gets older,his needs and interests change parallel to his age. Although there are some people who want to live their earlier life,the commonly accepted fact is that an old person does not want to live like he used to live when he was young. Anyway, a person lives his most exciting moments when he is young and being old is starting to share his expressions with younger people. It is a time of life when a person starts to think more than he used to. Young people enjoy life and old people live to earn a living for themselves.

First of all,the main fact is that an old person could not do the things that a young person can do. Instead of knowing how to enjoy life,there are some limits to what an old man can do. Anyway, a person lives his most exciting moments when he is young and being old is starting to share his expressions with younger people. It is a time of life when a person starts to think more than he used to.', 'Young people enjoy life and old people live to earn a living for themselves.']

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I agree that successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well. title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: Personally, I prefer to acquire broad knowledge, and I believe that broad knowledge would be helpful for a person anytime. Therefore, I agree with the opinion that it is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject. Of course, I guess other people might explain it equaly valid for learning one specific subject only. In fact, I am planning to attend a PhD course at a graduate university. title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I rather agree and disagree with the statement that 'Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities'. Well it depends on the people and how they take the situation. Young people who are more enthusiastic about forming a community can tend to help more. And they would rather give enough time to dedicate to helping their communities. On the other hand,some people show less concern towards helping their communities. Perhaps they would be rather busy with their day-to-day activities. They would be more self-centred and they would never even bother about helping their communities. It is not necessary for younger people to dedicate much of the time helping their communities,infact a small amount of help can help much better. Sideways people with positive views towards developing a community are more concerned about helping their communities and dedicate their sufficient work to helping them make their communities better. They will organise more effective programs to help their communities. They will arrange more and more effective plans to take their communities in a straight way. The young people should be motivated to help their communities and effective programs should be implemented to motivate people. Moreover some or more young people are more than enough for a community to develop. However the formation of communities helps most things to grow in a straight way. It will also give suggestions to most of the problems. Communities should be developed in such a way that they should drive the people's attention towards them. They can do this by organizing some cultural activities on some occasions. By doing so, most young people will be motivated to help their communities. So by all of the above points,not all young people are not concerned about helping their commodities.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: HAVING A BROAD KNOWLEDGE OF MANY ACADEMIC SUBJECTS, OR SPECIALIZING IN ONE SPECIFIC SUBJECT? Having broad knowledge of many academic subjects can make the students know a little about every subject but it won't get focused on a specific subject. Specializing in one specific subject can make the students know everything about one subject but won't make them know almost anything about other subjects. People choose jobs and they only have to know all the information about that specific subject that they work on. They aren't responsible for knowing information about any other subject. These ways the distribution of jobs is formed. Although this way of job descriptions is formed, knowing everything about one subject can make people bored. Knowing a little about every subject makes people open minded and more interesting. They can look at the world from different angles and since humans are social beings , a little color into everyone's life is needed. If people only knew about one topic and had no idea about any other topic, everybody would be bored. People would only make friends with people of the same job type because they would have no common subject with people of other job types. If people knew a little about everything and did not focus on one topic, then everybody would have to do all of its work itself and no job distribution would be made.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: Understanding ideas and concepts is more important for students than learning facts. I agree with this statement. There are several reasons for this. One does not have to waste time learning facts and also experience can help students to learn facts. Just understanding the idea and concept can also help to be more creative. It is a waste of time giving students everything about the topic. They need to run their own brains to understand what the whole lecture is about. For example in an art class, the teacher wants students to create a new tool for thekitchen. He gives the idea about what he wants but if he gives the facts they do not have to search for anything to increase their knowledge and ability as well. They can not look from a different perspective. Experience is one of the most important points to learn something. For instance, you studied for your lesson and you got your driving licence. Without having experience of how you expect to drive as well as the others can. Experience is more important than learning facts. You give the idea and concept. Afterwards they experience it in real life by facing them. Being flexible in our creations depends on how free we are. Just having ideas can help you be more creative. In order to think well, sometimes we should learn facts by searching for them. In conclusion, trying to learn facts is a kind of waste of time and without experiencing the concepts we learn do not help us to improve ourselves. For these reasons i disagree with this statement.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: Broad knowledge is very important in academic life. A person who wants to have an academic career should be aware of a lot of academic issues. However specialization makes people more successful and unconfused. So I do disagree with the statement. First of all, it is obvious that people who have academic careers, should have a broad knowledge of not only academic subjects but also global issues around them. However specialization is necessary for the academic periphery. Let us imagine a professor; when a student asks some general questions about his or her research project, he can answer them but if the student asks some specific questions, the professor can not be satisfied with details. The brain has a capacity for knowledge. If a human behaviour focus on a lot of issues, he or she can be aware of many more things but can not know anything in detail. Secondly, when we look at developing countries, we see that specialization is the main point in this development process. People do what they know best. Without argument it is clear that intellectual knowledge is important in social life and benefits people to have a vision of life. However, in the academic career specialization makes people successful. People have a perception capacity. Therefore people should choose subjects which are in their perception of an academic career. In conclusion, all of those reasons show that a person who wants to succeed in his or her academic career, should specialize in some subjects. The academician can be confused by the other option. People should do their best in their working life. Making the best happens only if specialization happens. Broad knowledge brings broad intelligence, it can be denied.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: In my opinion, traveling the world with a group led by a tour guide is a waste of time and money. First of all, while they give you time to explore places, it's a very short time, so you miss out on lots of things that are necessary. Secondly, crashing a bus that drives for hours and hours without knowing anybody or anywhere just isn't a fun thing to do. Finally, some tour guides don't even know what they are talking about, and don't talk when they are supposed to, so you have to take risks on picking the right time and date. Let's say that you went to an University of Harvard, and they have lots to see like the science center, and famous people who graduated from that place like Bill Gates. So the tour guides tell you to explore places within half an hour which is a very short period of time in such a large place. So while you are looking at unnecessary things, time goes by, and you miss out on the important things like the golden statue. Also if you don't make it in time for the bus, they all complain about waiting for you eventhough it is just for a minute. Eventhough, you go to places with your family or friends, they have lots of other people on the bus who are traveling with you. You could get bored only by talking to your family members or your friends. But some people don't care, because they also have TV's on the bus to entertain you, but it only entertains me a bit. Then all you hear is chattering going on and on beside you and infront of you. You can't tell them to be quiet, because they will point fingers at you and even curse you. The other thing is that if you want to sleep, and lean back your chair a bit, they complain to you about how uncomfortable it is which is very annoying. The Great Wall of China. It has lots of history and legends to it. Surely, people want to know about it, but the tour guide doesn't even say a word about it, and even if he talks aloud, he doesn't know what he is saying. Well i am not saying that every tour guide acts like that, but if you pick the wrong time and date, you will have to face the consequences. Therefore, i disagree with the statement. First of all, the tour guide doesn't give you the right timing for you to explore the place. Secondly, you barely know anybody on the bus except for people who came with you, and finally the tour guide would stink if you picked the wrong bus.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: Some people believe that it is important to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects while other people believe that it is better to specialize in one specific subject. In my opinion, having a broad knowledge of many academic subjects is better than specializing in one subject for two reasons. Having broad knowledge has many advantages for people. It gives people great experience in all fields. By watching, listening and reading about all topics in life. For instance, when anyone is interested in politics. He may talk and argue with anybody in it. Thus, it will let people have more consciousness about everything in their lives. In addition, having general knowledge enables people to take the right decisions. Because they are not going to hesitate according to their knowledge. Having general knowledge in all fields has disadvantages.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Some people keep enjoying, sometimes indulging, their youth. They believe that young people enjoy life more than older people do. So they have to consume their limited youth for enjoyment. I have to say such an idea is inappropriate since enjoying life is not a priority for young people. There are many types of enjoying your life, no matter whether you are young or older. Everyone, at any age, can find his or her way of enjoyment. Young people are physically energetic so that they can climb mountains, play Internet games, play basketball and do disco dances. Older people can travel in more peaceful ways like on a cruiser, playing chess and gathering to watch basketball matches. Some enjoyments are just mission impossible for young people in the sake of age.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I agree that it is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts. When I was a high school student, I usually learned just facts. It was a system of korean education. For example, in math class, I could learn a lot of information in a short period. However, I usually got low grades in each test. Because the teacher changed the style of problems in each test, I could not use such factors which I learned before. That's why I think understanding ideas and concepts is more important. Next, if I understand ideas and concepts of problems, I can use them in our lives. For instance, I learned the effective value of electronic products through my physics class. Therefore, I can save on utility fees because I can find which products are more effective than others in the home. Finally, if we knew about concepts and ideas of some accidents, unfortunate accidents would never happen in the future. For example, if we just know factors of invasion from other counties, the invasions would be faced again because we did not know how to prepare them.

Let's take as an example Alexander Graham Bell, when he invented the telephone, he made lots of different adjustments some work some didn't. Second, in order to make a mistake a person needs to be willing to take risks. If no risks are ever taken there is not a mistake that can occur. The same things happen over and over again. The person is in a cycle. Going back to our example, Mr.", "Bell was deaf, how could he have invented a telephone? Don't you need to hear to be able to speak through a telephone? Mr."]

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: Some people say that learning facts without understanding is more important because these days information is social. However, I disagree with this. There are a number of reasons : if we do not understand an idea, we can not use it. Absolutely, we can use it without understanding ideas and concepts but we can not use that those are natural.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I disagree with that statement. Because i don't believe that in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than there are today. Because the population of the world is continuously growing, there will be more people living on the earth than today. So it means people will need more cars for their requests or anything else whatever you want to call them. If we look back, our past will show us, we are always using more by time. For example, if we used 10,000 cars in the 1920's, we would use more than 500 million cars today. This is only one example, there is always a good table showing us we always use more cars than last year. And it will continue to go up like this. Lets look at it from a different point. There are car facilities and others like tear producers etc. So, they will always need to be developing new models of car and other parts. And we are drivers or whatever we call, shortly people will be changing their cars to another new car. In this while other poor people , i mean who do n't live in good lifestyles or conditions. Then as you see there will be two carsin use, if you think other people do thesame too, so can you tell me, in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than there are today? There won't be fewer cars in use in the future. If you look around and think that, when you were child there were fewer cars, but when you were grown up, if you think carefully then you will see that cars are raising with time. Now look around, how many cars there are? Was it less than the time you were child? No It's not. Because there are more cars in use now than in previous times. Finally i will say we will see many cars in use in the near future. If we don't find solutions to traffic problems, we will be in big trouble. We will waste time in traffic and we will waste gas for nothing while waiting in traffic. Also i think patrol companies won't let it be less cars. Because how many cars there are, they will sell that much gas and earn money. We can give many examples like these. Hopefully there won't be many cars than today for a more healthy life.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: Many people say that we need to study a lot of subjects when we are high school students. Actually, when I was a student, I couldn't understand why I had to study everything. I wanted to study just because I love it. However, I really think that studying many academic subjects is more important than just one specific subject after I became an adult. There are two specific reasons why I do. First, we need to have knowledge of people's studies since humans appeared many many years ago as human beings. When humans were just born in ancient times, there wasn't anything but people studied themselves and invented many things so we are now. We need to study their history to study like mass, language, chemistry and so on. Then, If we study many academic subjects, students know which one is so interested in them. It's the most important thing. Because school is providing many subjects, students can learn new categories of study. It's good experience for them. After that, they can decide which one is really good for them and it's a good opportunity to find their major at university and job in the future. In conclusion, if people study just a specific subject, it's perhaps better.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I agree with the statement. First of all,every body agrees that successful people are not ordinary people. Because they've found a way to get richness and success while others are still stay poor in either their money or their futures. Successful people usually think differently. For instance,an average person who makes about 50 thousand dollars a year would probably save 10 to 20 thousand dollars in their bank accounts. What a successful person would do is use the money to invest other than put that much money into a bank. That's how a small amount of money gets larger and larger. Successful people think things in advance. They look at the market and they will know what hot deals are going on. They would find out which you can and which you cannot do. They would figure out which worthes the risk to invest in. In other words ,they have the intelligence to distinguish good stuff from bad stuff. Any way,successful people are usually businessmen. My friend John is a stock bloker who works on wall Street. He makes money only out of looking at how the stock goes. He usually works at home, and seldom goes out. But he knows every thing. He gets information from the internet. He's just more intelligent. Once he knows what the stock will go for,he knows for sure.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I agree that people are now very busy thinking about offering some help. It is very important to understand that today the world is very competitive, and young people have to be dedicated to their learning, developing their skills and improving their capacity to answer the demands of new professionals. However is true that there exist other kinds of people that are very competitive with the situation of others and the mayorality of these people are young people. This world is very complicated and is very difficult to achieve individual goals. People have to work very hard, they do not have any time to breathe, to stop and to think in another situation. Life is tough and they have to give an answer about what their role is today. People try to have success, try to demonstrate their worth and work to be the best. They have to study , next to find a good job and to survive in this competitive world. Then they are very tired of spending their time on another task. They do not have too much time and they know it. However today things havechanged. Actually young people are starting to be more concerned about helping their communities.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Recently, it seems that young people do not give enough time to helping their communities. Unfortunately, I can not help agreeing with  this. Including me, most young people do not feel a strong relationship with their communities. In my experience, there are two reasons which make me think that way. First, an athletic festival is held in the community where I live annually, I think taking part in something community event means helping it. I have taken part in it just once. But in fact, I could not find any young people there. I reckon the reason why young people do not attend that festival is that young people prefer to spend time with their friends to family or their communities. I also guess that some young people think contributing or helping their communities is a kind of waste of time. Second, especially recently, young people such as university students tend to live by themselves. Actually, most of my friends live apart from their family. It means that it is no longer possible to help their communities.

Second, especially recently, young people such as university students tend to live by themselves. Actually, most of my friends live apart from their family.', 'It means that it is no longer possible to help their communities.']

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: In my opinion, there will be fewer cars than today. the main reason for this is technological development that makes life easier day by day for today's people. We can also take the oil reserves in to consideration for the decrease in the number of cars. The technological development is so great and unpredictable that one can do something which might have only been a dream in the past like reaching the information he wants just by clicking some buttons. Therefore the development may result in the development of mass transportation and with the benefits of mass transportation ;like the cost and availability ; people will be willing to use them instead of using their personal vehicles. In twenty years there may be some kind of train which can go faster and cheaper than those of today's or mankind will invent a machine which can transport people to another place in seconds just like we watch in the science fiction movies like 'battle star galactica' or ' star wars'. There is another reason why there will be fewer cars on the roads that is the lack of oil reserves in the world. when you think that 99 percent of vehicles use oil for the energy they need this might sound more predictable unless the man kind finds another source of energy like sun or a kind of an element which can be used instead of oil. It does not make much sense to say this because the scientists spend more time finding other means of transportation than finding useful elements or sources of energy to do the work which oil does today.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: In my opinion, I think that it is better for undergraduate students to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects. What is more, it is better for graduate students to specialize in one specific subject. My reasons are listed as follows. In the first place, the majority of undergraduate students face the problem of finding jobs when they graduate from university or college, except for the students who plan to pursue a higher degree. If they have broad knowledge of many academic subjects, it means that they have more opportunities to receive a good job. On the other hand, it is obvious that undergraduate students just receive a vocational education at university.

If they have broad knowledge of many academic subjects, it means that they have more opportunities to receive a good job.', 'On the other hand, it is obvious that undergraduate students just receive a vocational education at university.']

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.

On the other hand, it is obvious that undergraduate students just receive a vocational education at university. With broad knowledge background, undergraduate students will become competitive in the job market. As far as graduate students, Since their tasks are outstanding in one special field, and they have not enough energy to study deeply in various fields. Therefore, it is suitable for graduate students to specialize in one specific subject. As far as I am concerned, I always believe that a graduate student is a person who is so intelligent that he or she can contribute to the field of science which he or she is studying. Admittedly, having broad knowledge of various academic subjects is definitely beneficial for graduate students to achieve success in their special field.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Successful people do not have to try new things if they are satisfied with their success. They should improve their successful job rather than try totally new things. Of course, they can try new things but there is no promise of success again. I suppose that people who have achieved success are not so careful to try new jobs because they have confidence in their success.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Can we say that success and creation are linked? The main point is to make a difference between financial success and personal success. Through a financial point of view. New things are not always successful. Indeed, success as well as failure are parts of the risk. For instance, when you gamble in a casino, you can win but you can also win. Maybe the first thing is to analyze what is to be successful. A successful person can also be the one who tries what he really wanted to try, the one who is not afraid of realizing his dreams. The issue of the try doesn't influence the value of the act. Which is taken into account is the will to realize his projects and achieve his dreams. Therefore, we can say that people who act and react are successful people. They attract admiration and respect from others. Indeed, taking risks and trying new things are a proof of courage. Trying new things can turn a person into a leader. Even if the try ends up being a failure, because it is new, it is always a start for something else new. title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: In the past, young people used to help their parents and their communities. But nowadays it has changed. I agree with the fact that young people nowadays do not give enough time to their communities for many reasons. Helping the community is a very important thing to do but nowadays young people do not give enough time to helping their communities.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Nowadays, there're so many debatable issues about young people's life style. In particular, some people think young people don't give enough time to helping their communities, so they look down on young people. However, I think the young generation spend enough time on their communities and they shouldn't spend more time helping communities. Because there's a major volunteering class ( in school), young people have numerous things to do without helping communities and young people's time is for dreaming. First of all, there're a lot of programs to make young people help communities, and almost all young people do it.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: I do not agree that advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. It makes consumers disappointed with the products that they see through advertising. The reason why advertisements make people disappointed is by showing unreal commercials then people would like to buy the products. And then the consumer would probably spend a lot of money on it even though they do not really want to spend money on it. The effect of unreal advertising brings people uncontrolled. Moreover, it makes consumers happy when they see the unrealistic advertisements because it seems like the products people see are ideal things or unimaginary things that people do not have in ordinary life.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: Nowadays, there are some kinds of ways to learn something which have never been done before in personal life. I disagree with the statement that it is more effective to understand ideas and concepts than to learn facts. People should face the facts about what would be more Important things. First of all, there is no doubt about the fact that facts are composed of real things. Most of them have records or certifications in several ways, writing, taking photos, painting, or existing substance itself like a fossil. There are obvious no assumptions and personal opinions in the facts. Besides, facts would not change their form because they can not be made by human thoughts. For example, the earth exists in the solar system, it is a fact. But some people had ideas the earth was just existing on its own, no system, in the ancient world. Second, ideas and concepts are based on facts. If there are no facts, ideas and concepts can not be born. People tend to add to some thoughts in their own way on the fundamental, facts. In the other words, facts bring human thoughts, ideas and concepts. In conclusion, facts have some more advantages for the study than ideas and concepts that I have shown above. There is no possibility of existence without ideas and concepts.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Taking risks could be good for some people, and could be the worst thing that they do for some people. It relies on faith. taking risks may be good for some people because many people think that where there is a risk there are a lot of opportunities. These people love to take a risk, and like to challenge themselves with these risky things. Also if you get lucky when you take risks you will open a new door for yourself, and you may be successful, and feel happy. However, If you try something new, and you do not succeed, you will feel mope, and everything in your life will be destroyed. In addition, when you take risks you will be stressed. So keep away from taking risks, and do not try to do new things that you do not know how to do.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I agree with this statement, "it is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts. I've been going to school for 12 years. I am a high school student. I learn many things at school. My favorite class is English class which i think is the most important subject we have to learn. In English class, we read some books and discuss what the book tells us. When we discuss books, everybody has different opinions and it is stimulating to know what other people say and figure out what the author is trying to say. There are too many messages in books for a person to understand by oneself. I think we need to discuss with many people who are smarter and have different ideas. The books don't tell us facts.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: At present, I donate some money to the Foundation of Bill Gates as a sponsor to be able to help AIDS patients who have suffered in South Africa. He is already one of the billionares in the world with a fame. However, he is turning to others' lives to help them without personal greed and seeking only rewards. title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: I agree with the opinion that most advertisements make products better than they are. Now we live in a high tech advanced society in the 21st century. All over the world are getting smaller by using the computer. We can exchange information together by all kinds of communication systems such as the internet and mass media. Even though we purchase one item, we try to get information about all resources. For a good example, most advertisements make customers guarantee their products. In order to become good brand products to appeal to customers , the company focuses on better products. We can't deny the advertising's importance in relating good products. Most consumers think that better products are introduced into the televisions, radios,and other mass media. Most advertisements should imply that advertisements' products guarantee good qualities to attract customers. Now most companies recognize that advertising products should be the best products than other ones to succeed in the business. To take the example of Coca Cola drinks, they are not American drinks any more. It is the world drink all over the global village. Without advertisements, it couldn't exist any more. In order to survive the world brand drink , they have continued to improve the best soft drinks than other brands. In conclusion , I want to insist that more advertisements for products should be recognized as better products than they really are.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Yong people are the future of a nation and the motor of its growth and fulfillment. They have always represented the symbol of energy and hope. Nowadays,young people have to carry a big responsibility from elementary school to achieve their dreams. Since they have many concerns in life,they tend to give shorter time to help their community. I think that this matter is due to the interaction of many factors. The first major factor,is the school's busy schedule. This limits the time given for young people to do community work so they can't be very efficient since they do not have sufficienttime. The second matter, is the increasing number of video games and entertainment that encourages young people to isolate themselves in their rooms and spend hours with technological machines rather than integrate into a club or a volunteering association. This behavior leads to a vicious circle because the more these young people hide behind their computer screens and games the more they split from society and the community actions and the more they will be aware of the importance of community help.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I agree with the statement, that successful people try new things and take risks earlier than other people. In my opinion successful people know what to do for a well doing business. They are more confident because of their success. I think only the development of new ways and new technologies can make you successful for a long time and that is what they want to have. Success for the rest of their lives. They know that when they stay at their level, maybe the others will enforce them and then they fall down at a lower level. So the invention of new things is also a defense mechanism. I think, if you are successful and you do the same work everyday, then you get bored with what you are doing. For good and successful work you have to enjoy it and if it is boring you can not even enjoy it. Another reason for taking risks is that the people may not lose their jobs when they are unsuccessful. That gives them the possibility to improve new procedures. Probably the fact of being restless and of taking risks is the key to being successful. And when you are successful it is easier to try new things. Think about a person who sells newspapers the whole day, if he tries new things to sell more newspapers, it could have a bad end for him.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Most people use the car as a part of their daily life for travelling. there are other ways of travelling like motorcycles,aeroplanes and trains but these ways of travelling have theirown drawbacks. consider the case of motorcycles : these are felt useful only when travelling a distance less than 10 km. if the distance increases we feel uncomfortable with motorcycles. moreover people see cars as a status symbol considering the case of travelling by means of trains: the train timings are fixed and are not flexible to our requirements and the facilities are not that good onall trains. we must be there at the station strictly by time if we are a little bit late we will miss the required train consider the case of travelling by means of aeroplane : though the facilitie s on planes are good they are suitable only for travelling larger distances that are more than 200 km and more over cost of travelling by aeroplane is not affordable for every one and timingsare not flexible to our requirements. The construction of an airport requires huge land and capital now considering the benefits of travelling in our own car: firstly the timings are flexible to our requirements. we feel more comfortable in a car than a motorcycle or train. it also reflects our status. in countries like india people strive for status and most people buy cars to show their status. Moreover, in a car around four people can travel at a time saving travelling fares. we can travel to rural areas where travelling by train or plane is not possible. we can enjoy reading books magazines novels etc and listening to music sitting in the seat behind thedriver. we can even watch movies while traveling in a car. we can stop at any place we want. Moreover, we complete all our works which are on the route by travelling in a car which is not possible in case of travelling by train. Thats why i agree with the statement that "in twenty years there will be fewer in use than there are today".

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Life is just a short journey in every person's life. It's a small stop before our long lasting life.
sents: ["Life is just a short journey in every person's life.", "It's a small stop before our long lasting life."]

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Nowadays people are living in a mixed world with all kinds of generations and where the community grows faster. How can you help your communities with the time you have? ? ? First of all, in my opinion, I am a student of twenty years old, and I would say that in your everyday life,you never find any time for all you want to do. As far as I am concerned,I would say that giving time to other people, or being investigated in an activity requires a lot of human qualityand a strong engagement. It might not be easy to help our community when you have responsibility at work, at home, with children. In order to manage a good way of living we have to make choices at any time during our own life. Secondly , we can consider the problem from a different point of view. If you are living in a huge town it will be more difficult to help the community than living in the country. Thanks to their small village in the country,everybody knows everybody. The fact of the densification of the population,it's easier and faster to link and create central meetings. Obviously, the democracy will grow up with the help of younger people. I don't really agree with the fact that young people do not give enough time to the community.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Generally people who are successful take risks that other people might be frightened of. It is not easy to make a decision to take risks; however, there is a massive chance of being successful after dealing with the risks. There are some advantages to taking risks when people do business. First of all, there is your own opportunity to succeed. If you operate a business with an initiated item, there is only success or failure. When a person thinks that the item that he/she has is exotic, other people might think it is, or not. If you read other people's minds and invent an item that other people couldn't think of, then your company will be the necessary or need other people. Secondly, people who take risks, they can save a lot of time. As an example of the most successful person in the world, Bill Gates, he quit the college where he studied. After all, he invented DOS and Windows with his friends and coworkers, he became the richest man in the world at a very young age. Therefore, taking risks could make a person become successful even though he/she doesn't have a school grade. Finally, taking risks not just makes you rich, but it also makes you facmous and helpful to other people. Most successful people who take risks are famous and other people need them. Being rich with business that other people also do may not be too difficult to attain, but being famous and being needed by other people is not easy to achieve. In conclusion, people are afraid to take risks, but it is a chance to be more successful than other people. With the advantages above, it is clear that dealing with risks has more chance of success than doing what other people do. Taking risks could destroy people's lives; however, if you are born into this competitive world, isn't it valuable to take risks if you can succeed?.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: It is difficult to make a certain prediction about this topic, because on the one hand taking care of the environment is becoming more and more important nowadays and on the other hand technology is definitely part of our life. Anyway, I believe that in twenty years there will be fewer cars than there are today because modern life moves fast, communications are very important and there are new, ecological energies that can avoid car pollution. Modern life moves fast, especially in big cities. People in big cities work very hard and work many hours. For that reason these workers really appreciate their free time and want to be able to move fast to enjoy it. Nowadays public transport is not as useful and efficient as having your own car. Having a car is not that expensive, so many people can afford to have their own car. The economy is growing 3 per cent every year so hopefully in twenty years people will be able to buy nicer cars, instead of having to take the subway or the bus.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: Society has changed enormously in the last ten years. Now is fondamental to have academic instruction to work. Some jobs are widely spread like those in the economic fields. Some others are more unusual than those in engineering fields. For these reasons it is worth choosing a career well based on what one wants to do. Here in Italy, the university has also been transformed. Now you have to attend many courses and take many exams (about thirty) at the first level in order to be a doctor, in the wide general sense. Making this, you study a lot of different subjects that bring you broad knowledge. Sometimes, unfortunately, somebody can lose himself between too many exams, but other times one can discover what he really wants to do. In fact you can decide if you stop your studies or go on by attending courses of the second level. The second way leads you to take other, more specialized exams, that allow you to be a medical doctor.
