title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: As I am trying to assess the state of the number of cars being used twenty years down the line, we can primarily look at the things that might actually be the core reasons, which can minimise the use of cars The reasons I see for the decrease in the number of cars are to decrease consumption of fuel as fuel is being scarce day by day, to decrease environmental pollution, people looking for more faster means of transport, might become too expensive. As we can see from the reasons, to decrease the consumption of fuel, there is no need to curb the use of cars instead we can try and invent new means of fuel for ignition, for instance people have already started using cooking gas as fuel, but it is agreed that it is too dangerous as a small spark can ignite the whole vehicle, so research has to be conducted to develop. and the ease of availability of cooking gas is also specious, but there is definitely an alternate way to produce fuel Another reason for the decrease might be that maintaining a car might become too expensive, as the number of cars increased the consumption of fuel increased too, this led to a decrease in the availability of fuel or over all depletion of the fuel in the world, this will lead to increased fuel costs. Not only this for maintaining a car, we need a space to park it, increasing use of this means of transport in metropolitan cities has decreased the availability of space, sometimes getting small amounts of space is much more expensive than one can visualize. People might choose more reliable and faster means of transport, which may be some cheaper air transport. This is not a completely imaginative idea, but this has already been put to practice to create a few planes which can be used by ordinary people, if these become more compact, easier and faster, people might well opt for the same, but this might not be possible in just twenty years. infact, I believe that there might be many more cars than what we currently have, if the rise in the use of cars is considered.

May be developed countries might have already exhausted their use of cars in all their metropolitan cities, but we still have the scope to grow in the developing countries. another point that can be described is the fact that a growing population needs increases the scope of travel, thus increases the number of means of transport that we use. as the population of the world is definitely in an increasing state, there will never be a decrease in the number of means of transport they use.

May be developed countries might have already exhausted their use of cars in all their metropolitan cities, but we still have the scope to grow in the developing countries. another point that can be described is the fact that a growing population needs increases the scope of travel, thus increases the number of means of transport that we use. as the population of the world is definitely in an increasing state, there will never be a decrease in the number of means of transport they use.', 'As the car is the significant means of transport in this modern world, it is prone to increasing too.']

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Most young people and old people enjoy their lives. Some people might say that young people do not enjoy their lives because they have to study hard and find jobs for their future. However in modern society most of them enjoy their lives more than older people. Older people have to earn money for their kids and have responsibility for their own families, but young people have various ways to play such as computer games and TV. They can also have a lot of food if they want because of their parents. Older people might have their own kids and families. They have to feed and educate their kids. To do this they have to work hard, pay taxes , and give some money to their kids. Some older people can not exercise for their health because of the tight schedule and hard work. Older people do not seem to enjoy their lives.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: Every one on earth has his own ideas that could impress or depress the environment around him. The presence of these ideas does not cancel the fact that facts are dominant in our world. There is a huge difference between the two concepts and most people get mixed up between the two. Ideas are a special state of a person's own inspiration and thoughts like the idea of inventing a time machine while Facts are things that remain unchanged for the rest of life like the fact that the Sun revolves around Earth.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: This is a very hard discussed question and I believe everybody you ask tells you a different answer about this aspect of the generation gap. But with the tendency that always the other group is accused of being more enjoyable than the one you belong to. So everybody's opinion as a young or older person could be affected by such an influence. Thus I am trying not to be affected by such group thinking. I would say the majority of our society is enjoying their life, although older people do it more. Surely one could say the young are lazy and the only thing they have in mind is making a party. But I think that relates to their younger and more active body and mind. And I am convinced the relatively short time young people party cannot be compared to the long periods the older people sit around watching tv, playing poker, or spending their free time in female chatting clubs. Of course there may be several older people that use their time efficiently by working, keeping the front yard nice or being active in a sports club. There are also people who are ill and cannot do what they have in mind. But in summary I want to make a statement about the mean, the normal, older person. Young people are simply doing much more, in both fields enjoying and working, than older people.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: There are some differences between young people and older people. I want to explain important points about their characteristics. First, young people are more active because they have to go to school, they have to learn what their requirements  are. They also have to grow to become what they want to be. Though, they are growing up, there are a lot of struggles that they have to face. They are confused and lost because they can not see what is going to happen next. Second, think about older people who are calmer and have knowledge, and go done with their development. They can do whatever they want to do because they finish high school. They may have time to think about their grand children who they got. But there are things that they can not do which is going to school, playing sports beyond their average , being expert at some new thing. So some limits come up to them because their age is increasing. But it doesnt mean that young people enjoy life more than older people do. For example, if you want to have your own time to relax, sleep, talk with friends, it seems like young people have time for those kinds of things, but young people may not do it because there are a lot of things to do like home work, sports club, planning for university or job. But older people may do it because they have time, maybe they are having a job that they really want to do. School work is hard to have fun, there is such a limited time, they are still struggling with everything. Older people can enjoy what young people enjoy, if they want to play sports as much as young people do then they can do it.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: Advertisements have been increasing a lot during the last 30 years. Does it work or is it just an illusion ? Knowing how much money companies are willing to spend in an advertisement I have to say it must work. Now there are some more reasonable ways of responding to the question. We could talk about packaging forinstance. Between products that offer the same thing, that are at the same price, I would rather choose the best looking one. For me the product aspect reflects its real quality. In this case the true problem is comparison. I don't think you make a product seem better than it really is, the point is making the product seem better than the other products ! I think this is really working. There is another way of advertising a product : getting the buyer to know the product before he even gets to buy it : advertising in magazines and  on television. In my opinion, this may be more efficient because the buyer won't necessarily compare the product to the other ones. He will just get in the store and search for that exact product because he has been told it is the best. In this case it is true that advertising is used to make the product seem better than it really is.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: There are people who support the idea that most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are, and others do not support this idea. I would say that I agree with this idea that most advertisers make products seem much better. In the following discussion, I would like to explain the reason with some examples. Firstly, in Japan, I have heard news that some people have died because of using to reduce weight pills. Recently, over weight problems have got bigger in Japan too. Many people want to reduce their weight in an easy way. This company imported this pill from another country and advertised it all over the country. It says that some people could lose 5 kg in two weeks or less than a week. Many people bought it and some of them had really terrible results. I am not sure that pill was the main cause of their death, but I had heard that it works to blood pressure. So some of them affected badly. Secondly, I like to go to restaurants or bars. I can choose from several kinds of foods from the menu. I decided on foods, because they look so delicious and they also have a great range of good prices. However, when I see the real one, sometimes I am disappointed. These foods are totally different from the menu, for example, the amount of food, taste and price. Whenever I see it, I decide I will not come here again. I understand companies need to have more profits from their products. They have to make people want to buy them. The advertisement plays an important part in their profit. However, if they show their product much better than reality, they will lose their trust from not only customers but also their company accounts. And they also lose their position in their field. Finally, I would say that the advertisements should not make products seem much better than they really are. Companies do their business in an honest way.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I totally agree with the statement that successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing familiar things. In my opinion, successful people, especially in the business world, can usually imagine things that will happen in the future. They can also see the trend of life therefore they can prepare for the change of life and try new things that may lead them to success. On the other hand, people who only do what they are familiar with do not have this kind of sight and ability to create things. To be a successful person, you have to be a pioneer to try new things. In the business world, "Time is Money". People do not only compete with others, they also fight for time. Time is the factor that determines success or failure. Therefore, trying new things is the key to success. People who do not take this kind of risk can never be success.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: In modern day cars are a very important mode of transport in people's lives. The car has become an integral part of human life. so,i disagree with the statement that in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than there are today". Cars nowadays are more important than we think. In most of the developed countries, people prefer a car as transport rather than other conventional transportation modes, like trains,buses etc. Therefore, they can say that the car has become a vital part of their day to day life. Cars may cause many environmental problems,but that can be avoided by using pollution free fuels. For example, we know that many car companies are developing new fuels that will not harm the atmosphere,like hydrogen fuel which in turn leaves water as a waste product rather than harmfulgases. Many economies in the world depend on the manufacturing sector where the car industry is one of the important ones to generate money forcountries. There may be different kinds of transportation modes after two years, but there will be cars which are more sophisticated and may not use conventional fuels Car industry has not spread its wings greatly in some countries which are developing now. For example, take India. The Indian economy has risen before. so, there is untapped potential in different industries. One of the markets in India is cars. title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Everyone in this world can enjoy his life in his own way. people are different in expressing their enjoying of life. How can we enjoy this life and be happy? Everyone knows that life is not easy and it needs lots of work to be a successful person in it. There are two groups of people who can enjoy this life, such as young people and older people. First, young people can enjoy life in different ways. For example, they can do many things in this life without any responsibility for what they are doing because they know that the responsibility is carried by their parents. Also, they can do a lot of things that older people can't do as a result of health. Young people can do a lot of activities in one day , but older people can't do that. So young people are the right people to enjoy this life. Second, older people can,t enjoy this life like young people. There are different reasons for that. The first reason, is that they are responsible for everything they do. Also, the reason for this is that health can't help them to do a lot of activities in one day. The logic provides these points in a very clear way. Old people had already taken their time to enjoy this life when they were young. So they have to give the chance for the other generation to enjoy their own life. Finally, in my opinion, young people are the right people to enjoy this life. That is because the older people had already taken their own chance. Also, i disagree that the older people must relax after they have finished their work in their whole life because they are the people who must have other work.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: The statement " Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well. "has several examples in scientific history that show that it is true. One of them is Albert Einstein, who at the beginning of his professional life had strong difficulties finding a suitable job. He ignored his friends who were arguing about not changing his job and went to a university in Berlin where he developed the theory of relative time. Another example (where the meaning of success is different) is the attempts to kill Hitler during the second world war. These people knew how to survive in Nazi society, but they took the risks of being killed because they believed in what they did. From the point of view we have today they were successful. Another side of the same coin is the recent economic  situation. The value of the firms only depends on their success at the stock fairs. As a result the managers are trained to push these courses and they don't care about their employees (it's not a risky behaviour, because everyone does it). In this case success is a question of the definition. But there is another way to succeed too. Doing continuously the work you know how to do well will give you a smaller but steady flow of success. Because people can rely on you it will have a positive influence on your work. My personal way to success is a combination of personal and professional success. On the one hand you must have the possibility to have i. g. a family. That's why you need professional success, with risky decisions that will allow you to earn more money. On the other hand personal success is never a result of risks.

That\'s why you need professional success, with risky decisions that will allow you to earn more money.', 'On the other hand personal success is never a result of risks.']

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I agree with the statement that successful people take risks rather than doing only what they know. Successful people do take risks as they want to escape from the ordinary life. I do not call myself a very successful person, but I once took a risk and my life has been better. First, some millionaire famous in one area, once was an expert in other things, and I think that happens because those people know how to master one kind of subject. Henry Ford, the father of the car, once was an expert on watch repair. He worked as one to earn his room rent and to study mechanics. Then he thought about transportation and invented cars. Next, the success is equal to the riskyness. Which means that when you have a high probability of failure, then you have a high reward when you succeed. I am in middle school grade three, since grade two, I have liked a girl. She is in the same school and I still like her. I wanted to say that I like her, but I got too shy when I stood in front of her. When I said that, I felt like falling down an endless cliff that I could never come up again, but when she laughed, said nothing and looked at me, I felt like a mattress holding me from the cliff, so I like her, and she knows that I like her. Lastly, risks are sometimes making something new or re-designing some products. Edison, the king of invention, once tried to hatch an egg, and did not go to school when he was in elementary school. His mother taught him. When he was grown up, he made a telephone which was already made by Alexander Graham Bell.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Cars were a wealthy sign twenty years ago. Only, those who roll in money and live in good conditions of living could buy a car. In today's society,in western countries, the majority of the population have a car. We can wonder if the increase in the purchasing power has increased the number of cars for the last year and if this increase in cars is a reality or just an illusion. To my mind, it is true that in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than there are today. The first reason for this increase in the number of cars is the increase in purchasing power. Twenty years ago, in western countries, there were clearly two social classes; the haves and the have nots. So, the upper class outnumbered the wealthier.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I whole heartedly disagree with the statement that younger people enjoy more than older people. Enjoyment is a feeling which is felt by people of all ages. There are certain times when each age group enjoys more than the other, all depending upon the problems faced by the age groups which are different in magnitude and time of occurrence. Both younger people as well as older people have problems to face in life. Each age group's enjoyment is curbed because of these problems, but the enjoyment is never far away. Lets take the example of a young boy. He does not enjoy it when he has to give exams, study, or go to school. However, he enjoys it when he goes to play, or when he watches television. In the same way an adult (middle aged) does not enjoy going to work, or working around his or her house. But they do enjoy it when they come back from work, when they are on a holiday, or when they go to a party. In the case of old people as well, they enjoy it as they do not have much work to do and live comfortably on their pension funds. But they face problems regarding their health. So this way every age group has its own share of enjoyment and problems. We cannot draw a fine line comparing who enjoys more or less as there are various factors such as time and society which decide that. Along with this there is also the fact that one's enjoyment can be another's problem. In contrast, children enjoy playing more and studying less. The adults (parents) have problems with that, which curbs their enjoyment of seeing their child study. When the child is forcefully made to study, then the parents' enjoyment becomes the child's problem. In the case of old people, their enjoyment is that they do not need to work.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I agree with the statement. In twenty years, major changes in technology will take place in our lives, those changes will make transportation so easy that people won't have to use cars anymore. Since the human being was born, he's looking forward to learning more about the world around him, therefore, he invented ways to transport from one place to another. He started with a horse and carriage. However, he wanted to transport faster, so he kept learning and learning until he made cars. Cars are very useful nowadays and in my opinion a person can't live without a car.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: I disagree with this statement that the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide. I like to travel and I have joined a tour group led by a tour guide many times. But I think I couldn't enjoy my trip. Now I would like to support my opinion using my experiences. First of all, I would like to make a travel plan myself. If I hired a tour guide or joined a tour group I couldn't go to any place wherever I wanted. A tour guide would make our day schedule and we would move and sightsee strictly. I want to take my time to see and know a culture and enjoy the country or city where I went. Secondly, I would like to research myself. If I hire a tour guide it is easy and convenient to know the culture where I travel.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: Some people say that the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide because of convenience and obtaining information by tour guide. Both ways of this argument have advantages. However I would side with that the best way to travel is alone without a tour guide because of the free and beneficial experience. Now then I will present this opinion by considering these two advantages. On the one hand, traveling with a group led by a tour guide might be said to bring advantages. On top of that if people travel with their guide they enjoy their tour conveniently. In other words the schedule is already set so people just travel without thinking such as where I am and then and so on. In addition the tour guide gives the tour information whenever people travel there. when I was in high school I travelled in America led by a tour guide the tour guide makes my family feel convenient. On the other hand,. Travelling alone without a tour guide would give many advantages. Firstly, if people travel alone they enjoy freedom and without inference and they can wander anywhere that they want. If the opportunity to travel is given to me I want to travel to the swiss that I want to go to. Secondly, travelling alone is a good choice by experience directly. In other words this is useful for social relationships and social experience. So traveling is very good. All these things considered, the two ways are both the best ways.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: What will our planet look like in twenty years? This question is in all the conversations about the consequences of what we are doing today. Will it look better or worse? It's not a debate today but one of the interrogations concerns the use of cars, which are becoming more and more accurate all over the world. On the one hand, we might think that the number of cars will progress significantly in the years to come, thanks to economic progress and innovations in technology. More and more countries nowadays use cars : in China, for example, the car industry is in great development, and as there are really many inhabitants, we must consider that it will be one of the most attractive markets in a few years. But on the other hand, we may add that considerations about environmental protection are taking more and more importance, Sustainable development is a recurrent term in speeches and official documents, more especially, of course, in developed countries, which had already known the excitement of car technology and had also already benefited from its advantages. So the point now is to find solutions to limit the damage to cars to the environment, such as the recent alternatives that are developing in France today. In big cities, the public power is making big ad campaigns in order to attract people to use public transport [bus, metro. ] or to use a bike. So in my view, it's obvious that we would never be able to make the number of cars decrease because of their general use; it's really part of our lives and I think that we wouldn't be able to live without cars, it's now impossible, cars have too many accidents.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Will there be fewer cars in twenty years from now? My instant reply is no, and mainly because I realize how our technology is rapidly advancing, and cars will change, changing only to make people love them more, satisfying urges for beautiful car models, creating more desires to own one. Looking back into the past since cars were first invented, there's a huge big difference in how much cars are owned. Compared to before when only the rich ownedcars, cars nowadays are getting cheaper in price, considering the amount of second-hand cars being sold and how cheap it is to buy one. As time passes, the rich will continue to buy more cars and sell their old ones, and at the same time, the lower class will buy these used cars for a cheaper price. With this cycle going on, more and more people will be owning cars rather than selling them. And why are the rich buying more and more cars? Generally it's because of the constant change in car technology; the desire for speed and unique designs. A stereotype view of rich people is people who buy cars just because of their looks. Car companies looking at this, will exploit this point by coming up with more and more uniquely designed cars. There's a rare chance rich people will disappear and their interest in buying these cars will decrease.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: Facts can be researched by students in order to improve their knowledge of an idea. There are several ways to support the statement that it is more important to understand ideas and concepts than acquire knowledge of facts. Science requires students to think constantly and develop a critical way of thinking. For example, for a lawyer it is more important to learn how to think logically than to learn a set of laws in order to be successful in his career. A set of laws can change within one period of Congress; this will leave the given lawyer who just learnt a set of laws obsolete. He will need to go to university to learn again the set of laws to be useful in his field. Fortunately, this is not the way that lawyers learn about their carrier, most of the knowledge acquired at a law school is to think logically. Even with a change in legislation a lawyer can still be a lawyer.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree that young people enjoy life more than older people do because they get more opportunities to play than older people. Another reason that young people enjoy life more than older people do is that they have much more energies than older people and by taking much more risks the younger people get more chance to experience and learn from their life. First of all, younger people get more opportunities to play than older people because they have enough motivation to enjoy playing. For example, at my age, my friends and I play often. We go hiking, dancing on the stage or in the clubs as well, and we also sing and listen to music, which is alot of fun. However, older people do not get alot of motivation like us, so they basically spend their spare time in their home or in the office where they work. Another reason that young people enjoy life more than old people do is that they have much more energies than old people. The old people are too old to go out and have fun because they do not have as much energy as young people.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Successful people really try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well. We live in an amazing world. Things change, people change. How could you be successful if you just go along the road that all the people already know how to do well. Yes, it's true that some things and rules are still right. People need to eat everyday, so I open a restaurant. So how could I not make money. But when others run it too, how can you make sure that you can still make money. So you need to change, you need to try new things,you need to take risks, or others will change, and then, you will just destroy yourselves. Who knows that computers will become extremely popular several decades from now. And people just thought that Bill Gates was such a stupid person. What if he goes and sees and does some law things his fathers just wished him to rather than trying new things and taking big risks to go on with his computer and software. Well we may haven't flown into the sky some years ago, but after the brothers used their lives to take the risk, you see what we can do now. No risks ,no win. That's our Chinese old words. Without the risks, how could we see the new country in the north American land. Maybe some works do not change,but the way we do them must be changed. If there are no new things, how could the world develop itself. All the things are still the same as a couple of years ago, the shop is still the shop,the stuff you can buy is still there, I can not imagine that.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree with the statement 'Young people enjoy life more than older people do. 'There were two main reasons for agreeing with this statement. They were 'variation of choice' and 'passionate'. For the first reason, young people can have more choice than older people do. Usually older people have less opportunities than young people have because of their age and also they have worse health than young people do. Also when older people get hurt, they recover slower than young people do becauseolder people 's cells are too old to reproduce themselves. This has caused older people's choices to become limited. For example, oldies cannot ride a ski or snowboard as young people do dangerous tricks because they have more risk than young riders have. The second reason is related to passion. Young people usually have more passion than old people do. For this reason, it is because of hormones and the different amount of experience. Old people have less hormones than young people have and hormones are one of the scientific catalysts that make the brain excited. As a result of this, even if young and old people do the same situation, their excitement is different because of the amount of hormones. For passionate people, the amount of experience also affects a lot. Usually a beginner has more excitement than a veteran does. For example, when two different types of people have the same girl friend, the amount of excitement is different between a lady and a guy who never had a girlfriend because a lady's guy already has experience of having a girl friend. This relationship does not change a lot between old people and young people because old people usually have more experience than young people have.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: In japan, students have to learn a lot of words in many kinds of classes from when they are children until they are graduated from universities. They, even high school students, learn more facts than ideas and concepts and they tend to have a variety of knowledge. However, they hardly learn how to think and organize their ideas or concepts. I do agree with the opinion that It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts. First, learning ideas and concepts develops the student's skill of thinking. For instance, In mathematics class, they learn how to solve the question and that makes them consider not just individual answers but all the same questions because each mathematical question is different but there is not one answer. Students do not learn facts in class, but the way of thinking is very important.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I don't consider myself a successful person. However my brother does rather well in a specific field which is gymnastics. And I have noticed that he has recently started playing tennis. So I have had the opportunity to figure out that when people are fairly good at practising an activity, they often try to do different things. There are two main reasons that support my viewpoint. One of the reasons which support this statement is that when one is successful, he often wants to explore other fields to figure out what he is worth. Taking risks, having an other kind of experience proves to be beneficial in that it enables you to know what you can do, what your skills are. Trying new things is a kind of challenge to yourself. for instance , i am quite sure that my brother decided to start playing tennis because it was a way to push out his limits. He probably thought that since he was very good at gym, he wouldn't be as good at playing tennis! However, trying to do different things to those that you already know how to do is not only motivated by personal reasons.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.

I would like to support this statement for the following reasons. First, By understanding the ideas and concepts we get a clear image of the aspect. For example if we are studying a particular subject. In that subject it is important for us to identify the main idea of the topic and the concept involved in that particular topic. Third, when we find out with new software or subjects, it will be better for us if we understand the main idea and what are the improvements over the previous one then these software will be useful forus. Consequently the conclusion is that we must learn facts and we must also understand the ideas and concepts that we learn then only then will it be useful for us.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.

When i go out, i can not hear her because of the car's voices. Wherever i look i see cars covered all around me. title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Usually, people are familiar with what they used to do. Some people fear new things because they are not sure about them, or because they cannot take risks even if this action could open new doors for them toward a good future. I believe that a person should take this risk sometimes and try new things in his or her life because I think that the ability of our minds is unlimited. Therefore, I completely agree with the opinion that says people who try new things are able to be more successful. In our life, getting risk is a fundamental part of our world. title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: Our civilisation is based on consumption and the economy so more and more industries resort to advertising to sell their products. Advertisements are everywhere so that we can't avoid them, that's why innevitably we are influenced by them, the question is in a good or a bad way? The aim of an advertisement is to make you buy its product by making you dream, by showing you things amazing. When you see an advertisement for perfume with a gorgeous woman taking a bath in gold water, you immediately imagine that when you put this perfume on your neck you will feel like her you will change your life and that men will run after you! And the day you will be shopping you will come across this perfume and it will remind you of the good feeling you had when you saw the advertisement, so you wont resist and buy it. What about the beautiful amburgers you can see on the front of certain food shops? ! They always seem attractive well done with good meat and green vegetables, but when you have it on a plate, what a deception. you could not even recognise the one you have chosen from another! The strategy used to convince people can change ,it depends on the target which advertisements have to persuade. But all the way ,they have to lie to us.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Most people have to try or choose something they do not Know what will happen after. In fact many people try not to be in danger of not risking their lives. However, there are many people who like to risk actually to improve their lives or to do something important. In fact there are a number of reasons for risk. One of them is to succeed and get better, and the other is to do something different. First, many successful people say the risk is the way to success. Actually, I agree with them but it is one of the ways to succeed because there is a chance of loss in any risk. But I think we should risk it sometimes because there is no chance to find another solution. Second, there are some people who do not prefer to risk for ever. In fact, they have some reasons for that, and the main reason they believe that no one can get more than he will get. I believe that is true but God will help us if we work and do our best to get what we need or want in our lives. So we can not stay at home or stay at the same level in our job without trying and waiting for something to happen. In fact that can not be.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: In the past few decades cars have been the most useful vehicle in the world. The use of cars is still increasing rapidly. There are many people saying the negative aspect s of cars, though I think the increase in car use will go on in the next twenty years or maybe more. The carbon dioxide which is emitted from those cars is said to be a big cause of global warming. This negative aspect should be prevented, but there are still a large share of cars. Why cannot people use trains and other social transport. In that way car users will be decreasing and it will be good for the environment. When I was still a child and did not have a driver's license I thought the pollution the car makes was evil and something that one needs to prevent. After a few years when I got the license the thought of pollution went somewhere else from my mind. It is just so useful. I think cars are like smoking. We know that this is a bad habit. Despite this fact, people just cannot quit it. The usefulness of cars affects the people. No one wants to be on a bus or a train when you see the people on there getting squashed and missable. We think we will use the car,more privately and more conveniently. I believe cars will not decrease forever. People cannot prevent th e desire to use such useful things so we need to think of another way, like inventing a car that is ecological. The amount of car share will be increasing as the population rises. The decrease in the population is the only way of decreasing the car.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: According to me the best way to travel is not in a group led by a tour guide. first of all, the best way to enjoy travelling is to go with an other person, It'sn't good to go with a group, because it's difficult to share your feelings and make a plan quickly and efficiently with many people together. For example if you need to shop you have to be worried about the feelings of your group, but it's easier when you travel with a friend or a member of your family to change the schedule of your journey. Secondly, all of your movements during the trip are restricted because you are in a group. For instance, if you have a plan to enjoy eating in a different restaurant, if you will meet many new people, it's not possible to do this in a group because during the trip you are always with your group, so you don't have the time to meet someone and the travel can be boring. Finally, if you travel with a guide you are not able to quit the group and to do what you want to do. You have to follow the instruction of the tour guide it's like travel information that's not good. For example if you go to some country in Africa like Ivory Coast, all the tourists like to go to yamoussokro to see the biggest catholic church in the world, the tourists don't take the time to visit the capital which contains some interesting stuff too. In conclusion the best way to travel is with a partner like a friend or a member of your family it's more fun. On the other hand, that depends on what you are planning to do and what's your purpose is. For instance if you want to travel for a history class or whatever. I agree that the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Nowadays, there are many people who believe that only doing what they already know how to do well is true. Nevertheless, I absolutely disagree with this point completely. I think that successful people try things and take risks to become successful. There are many successful people who also take many high risks before they / become successful and well-known. Bill Gates is a typical example in this situation. When Bill Gates was still a student at university, he realized that he would be a great man and hired by a big company with a great amount and stable salary after he graduated.
